programme.title: Capture Wild School
programme.desc: A student is prepared to carry out the darting of a massive problematic buffalo that has been terrorizing staff members close to a camp. This task must be done on foot and the student needs to practice darting from many different distances before he can proceed.

programme.title: Wow, I Never Knew That!
programme.desc: Wow, I Never Knew That! is a whimsical, half-hour television series that is jam-packed with exciting tidbits and fascinating facts that uncover the truths and origins behind the stuff youre already familiar with. From the items you use every day to the phrases you use in conversation to the habits youre so accustomed to, youll be fascinated to learn how theyve all really come about! Learn how a pharmacist and an accountant created the most famous drink in the world, COCA COLA! And, learn the "BEAR" truth behind how a U.S. president helped create everyones favorite stuffed toy, THE TEDDY BEAR! Then, how did a piece of wire accidentally "SLINK" its way to become a fantastic fun toy for children? Plus, how a the WIFFLE BALL was invented.

programme.title: Show Me Where You Live
programme.desc: Show me where you live is a documentary series that aims to answer the following question: How can human beings claim ownership to a space so that they can live safely within it, function as a society, and above all be in harmony with the environment around them? As we discover cultures and emblematic populations, we follow Philippe Simay who is at the heart of Inhabiting the World and represents its identity and originality. Philippe takes us on an epic adventure around the Human Habitat and sets the tone for the journey. As a humanist and philosopher, Philippe is a tireless surveyor of the city, and an explorer of living spaces. Determined to travel around the world, Philippe unveils how the populations that he encounters claim the space they occupy, shapes it and adjust to it. In this series of 20 films, of 26 minutes each, the habitat will be a major showcase revealing our capacity to adapt ourselves at a time where we need to find solutions in order to address immense changes.

programme.title: Big Five Challenge
programme.desc: Todays mission is to track and locate buffalo, get within 50 meters on foot and stay in that range for 10 minutes to qualify. The best buffalo photograph of the day will be judged by wildlife photographer, Kimi Stewart. Extra points can also be accumulated by identifying as many antelope species as possible. There are 16 different types in the reserve and lots of points for the taking. Devil and Prada strike early again and stalk up to a nervous herd of buffalos drinking. They take a number of great photographs and decide to frighten the herd off to make it difficult for the other 2 teams! The antelope seem to be putting on a great show today as team terminator and the Invincibles tick them off the list. By the time the afternoon session comes, team Terminator and the Invincibles concentrate on trying to get the perfect buffalo photograph but dont realize they are both working on the same buffalo herd that keeps running away from one team to another. The Terminators choose to hide up in trees in order to get close up photographs as buffalos run below. Will this provide the winning shot? Kimi Stewart chooses the best buffalo photograph of the day and also the best photograph of the entire challenge for a whopping 50 points. Who finally wins the ultimate 5 star 7 day luxury safari prize for 4 people? You have to watch it!

programme.title: Flying Over the Earth
programme.desc: A young French couple, Clementine Bacri and Adrien Normier set off on a one year long journey around the planet on board a light aircraft dedicated to science and education. Their goal: offer aerial support to public research laboratories, an unique opportunity to discover scientific activities and use them to teach science at school. In research areas, the crew has implemented observation and modeling techniques that are key elements for research.

programme.title: Blue Realm
programme.desc: Filmed using crystal clear High Definition technology, The Blue Realm takes the viewer on a fascinating and breath-taking journey of discovery beneath the waves to examine the unique biology and extraordinary behaviour of undersea animals. Filmed by expert divers with a passion for marine life and environment, the compelling stories and captivating creatures come from many locations around the world including Papua New Guinea, Palau, South Africa, the Red Sea, the Great Barrier Reef, the Bahamas, Cocos Island, British Columbia, Texas, Indonesia, the Socorro Archipelago, California and Florida.

programme.title: Inside Outer Space
programme.desc: Come with us as we explore and unravel the mysteries of what lies beyond our planet Earth. This is a series packed with space stories and information about our universe covering what we can see, how we can live in space and what science tells us about the past and the future as we journey inside out of space.

programme.title: Everyday Elements
programme.desc: A series that puts chemistry in our everyday experience by showing the living connection we have with the chemicals and elements that make up our world. The matter that built skies and seas, the atoms that make up you and me, the chemistry around us that forms the things we touch, smell and see. This series shows us what the objects in our universe and in our homes are made from and why the particles around us behave as they do. Everything around us is built from Everyday Elements.

programme.title: Everyday Elements
programme.desc: A series that puts chemistry in our everyday experience by showing the living connection we have with the chemicals and elements that make up our world. The matter that built skies and seas, the atoms that make up you and me, the chemistry around us that forms the things we touch, smell and see. This series shows us what the objects in our universe and in our homes are made from and why the particles around us behave as they do. Everything around us is built from Everyday Elements.

programme.title: Crazy About Your Pets
programme.desc: This documentary explores with tons of humor the strange and captivating bond between a person and its animal pet. Well follow 4 owners that have chosen a very special animal to keep them company, a pet quite out of the common. Your audiences will have the best time following the daily lives of these characters and there amazing pets: An athletic dog, a pounds pig, a cobra and even a Crocodile!

programme.title: The Polar School of Nomad Children
programme.desc: 360° GEO- Report visits the Nenets, the last true nomads on earth, on their remote Russian peninsula. Every August, on the Russian polar peninsula of Yamal, children of reindeer shepherds await a helicopter that will bring them back to school after the summer holidays. For the main part of the year, 600 nomad children from the indigenous people of the Nenet live and learn separated from their parents. Up until now, their home Yamal was an of Russia that was far from any semblance of civilization- until an enormous gas pool was discovered beneath the tundra. Now, destroyed nature and gigantic industrial plants are a common sight along the nomads track - but this industrial development is also offering new opportunities to their children.

programme.title: Blue Realm
programme.desc: Filmed using crystal clear High Definition technology, The Blue Realm takes the viewer on a fascinating and breath-taking journey of discovery beneath the waves to examine the unique biology and extraordinary behaviour of undersea animals. Filmed by expert divers with a passion for marine life and environment, the compelling stories and captivating creatures come from many locations around the world including Papua New Guinea, Palau, South Africa, the Red Sea, the Great Barrier Reef, the Bahamas, Cocos Island, British Columbia, Texas, Indonesia, the Socorro Archipelago, California and Florida.

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: On the Cities Rooftops
programme.desc: How is life on the citys roofs? This series scales new heights, exploring apartment buildings, towers and monuments to discover a world full of unsuspected treasures : our rooftops. By day and night, the population changes on these heights. There are people who work here, people who live here, and others who come here to relax. The worlds rooftops are a continual hive of activity…

programme.title: Wonder
programme.desc: Seg 1 Iridescence. Iridescence is the phenomenon where surfaces reflect a multitude of colors at once and could change color perspectives upon shifting the angle of viewing. Iridescence is caused by interference, where light gets reflected or cancelled out by the structures of the surfaces. Seg 2 Chemiluminescence. Chemiluminescence is the phenomenon of producing light energy through chemical reactions. The byproduct of a chemiluminescent reaction, instead of heat energy, is a photon or a light particle. Only selected compounds are capable of producing chemiluminescence, usually highly oxidized compounds when reacting with another compound. Seg 3 Bioluminescence. Bioluminescence is a form of chemiluminescence, only that this occurs in living things. Special compounds collectively called as luciferin oxidizes upon catalysis by enzymes called luciferase, producing oxyluciferin. Upon decay, oxyluciferin releases photons or light particles. Bioluminescence serve different functions for each organism, but all for survival purposes. Seg 4 Gemstone Coloration. A gemstone acquires its color through elements that are essential to its structure or through impurities, or elements that replace some of the metallic ions in the structure that will affect which colors in the visible spectrum gets absorbed or reflected. Seg 5 Mechanical Plant Defenses. Mechanical plant defenses demonstrate how survival instincts are incorporated into plant morphologies and physiologies by growing or producing various defensive features such as thorns, spines, and prickles to the less obvious ones like trichomes and raphides and less aggressive forms of defense like thigmonasty.

programme.title: Wonder
programme.desc: Seg 1 Visually-Evoked Auditory Response. VEAR or Visually Evoked Auditory response is the type of auditory perception where our brains perceive to hear sounds in response to seeing something. In the case of the jumping pylon illusion, a thud sound is perceived even though there is no sound accompanying the animation. Seg 2 Retinal Fatigue. Retinal fatigue is the term used to describe the condition when the photoreceptors in our eyes become tired or strained due to staring at one color for extend periods of time. The effect causes an afterimage of the complementary color to appear out of nowhere and will be temporarily visible for a few seconds. Seg 3 Muller-Lyer illusion. The Muller-Lyer illusion is an optical illusion where parallel lines of the same length appear longer when perceived with different pointed arrowheads drawn at the ends. Possible explanations suggest that our minds tend to look at overall length rather than just the lines parts or segments when processing the image. Another possible explanation is that our minds tendency to look at angled lines and perceive patterns of depth. Seg 4 Ames Room. The Ames room is a specially constructed room that features a distorted and skewed floor plan. when viewed from one angle, our brain is tricked into thinking that the perspective of the rooms is normal but when a person walks from one end to another the distorted floor angle makes it look as if the person changes size drastically. Seg 5 Synesthesia. Synesthesia is a genetic condition that is present in at least 4% of the human population. People with synesthesia have hyper connected neurons that allow them to perceive a stimuli as interconnected with different senses. An example of which is the ability to see color while hearing sounds.

programme.title: Wonder
programme.desc: Seg 1 Chromatic Adaptation. Chromatic adaptation is the ability of humans to adjust to changes in brightness to keep up with the appearance of colors. this is the reason why we are able to perceive colors properly even though lighting in real environments change constantly. Seg 2 Color-changing animals. Color changing in animals are developed adaptations which the animals use for various applications such as signaling their species or as a way to hide from predators. Animals that can change color have specialized cells called chromatophores that can alter pigmentation and light reflecting properties. Seg 3 How do we see the color pink. We are able to see pink because our brains are able to perceive variations in light and color. Although pink as a wavelength does not exist in the light spectrum, it is our brains that processes light in a such a way that we are able to perceive combinations of colors thus giving us a way to see colors like pink. Seg 4 Blue wings, blue feathers. Blue rarely exists in nature. But due to evolution, structural features in the wings and feathers of some animals allow light to bend in ways that make it possible to reflect the color blue. Seg 5 Snow camouflage. Snow camouflage, is a type of camouflage that certain creatures use to hide during winter. It is typically characterised by differing shades of grays and whites.

programme.title: What In the World
programme.desc: Timber is one of this countrys biggest natural resources and the source of great potential wealth. Hence the existence of wholesale illegal logging, irrespective of the consequences to the local environment. This has led concerned parties to set up the Olancho Environmental Movement. This organization has mobilized to protect these forests, at some risk to its members, like Rene Gradiz, whose testimony is disturbing in the extreme.

programme.title: Music Voyager
programme.desc: Music Voyager is a music and travel broadcast series (television/cable, broadband, in-flight and mobile) that invites viewers to discover the exciting sounds of the planet. The host is Jacob Edgar, an explorer who does not search for lost cities or ancient ruins. Hes on the quest for a different kind of treasure…music. As an ethnomusicologist and world music record producer, Edgar travels the globe hunting for the best songs the world has to offer, and he suffers through some of the worst…so you dont have to. Along the way, hes rewarded with a backstage pass to concert halls, street festivals, recording studios and rehearsal rooms. With local musicians as his guide, Edgar tastes exotic and occasionally ghastly food, visits off-the-beaten path attractions and parties the night away to amazing concerts at hidden venues that only the locals know. Join music voyager for unexpected adventures and surprising discoveries that unveil the magic, mystery and music of far off lands.

programme.title: Close Quarter Battle
programme.desc: Following the September 11 attacks, military presence became commonplace in New York and other American cities, and the counterterrorism forces were eﬀ ectively given a "blank cheque" when it came to ensuring that another terrorist incident would never take place on American soil. This episode of CQB takes an in-depth look at who was selected to occupy elite anti-terrorist positions, what they were trained for, and how they were equipped: when opposing forces are using commercial airliners and chemical weapons, countermeasures are by necessity complicated and varied. CQB takes an intimate look at what it was like to be an oﬃ cer on alert for chemical attacks in Washington DC, or an army reservist monitoring suspicious activities on the streets of NYC.

programme.title: Travel Thru History
programme.desc: Up, up and away! We discover St. Petersburg Floridas aviation roots at the St.Pete History Museum. Then, comb your mustache, we visit the Dali Museum to look at Salvador Dalis amazing masterworks. Well dredge the deep looking for sponges, and defend the bay at Fort Desoto.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Glamūrīgā bijusī modele Samira Fraša dzīvoja greznu dzīvi, īrējot vairākas mājas un pārvietojoties ar luksusa automašīnām. Līdz notika traģēdija. Divu bērnu māte tika atrasta mirusi sava peldbaseina gultnē, un abi viņas bērni bija pazuduši no mājas.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Divi brāļi tuksnesī īsteno sarežģītu shēmu, enšoties no bruņota furgona nozagt 300 tūkstošus dolāru. Kad izmeklētāji mēģina izsekot laupītājus, lieta kļūst par slepkavību - tiek atrasti abu furgonu vadījušo apsargu līķi.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Glamūrīgā bijusī modele Samira Fraša dzīvoja greznu dzīvi, īrējot vairākas mājas un pārvietojoties ar luksusa automašīnām. Līdz notika traģēdija. Divu bērnu māte tika atrasta mirusi sava peldbaseina gultnē, un abi viņas bērni bija pazuduši no mājas.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Armijnieks tiek nošauts kādā Kalifornijas tuksneša mazpilsētā. Izmeklēšana pārbauda draudzības saiknes un ģimenes lojalitāti, cenšoties atrast slepkavu.

programme.title: Nāvīgās attiecības ar Feitu Dženkinu
programme.desc: Vientuļā māte Nikola Halpina noslepkavota savās mājās. Viņas divi bērni kļūst par uzbrukuma aculieciniekiem, taču taisnīgums gūs virsroku - detektīvi izsijās Nikolas cienītāju sarakstu, atrodot viņas slepkavu.

programme.title: Algota slepkavība
programme.desc: Zināms acu ķirurgs lūdz savam IT speciālsitam atrast krievu slepkavu, kas nogalinātu bijušo darbinieku. Notikumiem sākoties, viņš maina mērķi.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Neatkarīgo filmu zvaigzne atrasta mirusi Griničvilidžā, un tas ir šķietama pašnāvība. Kad izmeklētāji sāk atklāt vienu baismīgu pavedienu pēc otra, viņi saprot, ka lietas nav tādas, kā šķiet.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: 1992. gada rudenī divi brāļi terorizē Kaliforniju, uzsākot divus mēnešus ilgu noziegumu, kas ietver trīs brutālas slepkavības un daudzus citus nāvējošus uzbrukumus. Izmeklētāji strādā, cenšoties šos slepkavojošos radiniekus apturēt, pirms viņi atkal uzbrūk.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Skaistā topošā kosmetoloģe Šenona Greivsa atrasta sakropļota saldētavā ar piekaramo atslēgu. Kad cita sieviete tiek pamanīta piebraucam un ieejam viņas dzīvoklī, detektīvi atklāj šausminošu slēpšanu.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Radio personība un veterānu aizstāve tiek nošauta pašas guļamistabā. Vai viņas skaļā viedokļa paušana bija iemesls šim noziegumam vai tomēr viņas ģimene slēpj pēdas līdz slepkavai?

programme.title: Nāvīgās attiecības ar Feitu Dženkinu
programme.desc: 78 gadus vecā Ina Grosa tiek vardarbīgi noslepkavota. Aizdomas krīt uz vienu no viņas pašas bērniem; radinieki stāv kopā, līdz tiek atklāta patiesība.

programme.title: Algota slepkavība
programme.desc: Nežēlīgs noziedznieks no krāpšanas pāriet uz slepkavību nozari, plānojot nežēlīgu atriebību tiesu sistēmai. Šis sižets aizskar detektīvus, kuri cenšas novērst sava drauga un kolēģa slepkavību.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Policija Austrumhārlemā atklāj divus noslepkavotus mīļākos. Nozagts tālrunis ved viņus ekspedīcijā uz Ņujorkas noziedzīgās pagrīdes centru un ne tikai. Patiesība, kas slēpjas aiz asinsizliešanas, viņus pilnībā apstulbina.

programme.title: Algota slepkavība
programme.desc: Nežēlīgs noziedznieks no krāpšanas pāriet uz slepkavību nozari, plānojot nežēlīgu atriebību tiesu sistēmai. Šis sižets aizskar detektīvus, kuri cenšas novērst sava drauga un kolēģa slepkavību.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Policija Austrumhārlemā atklāj divus noslepkavotus mīļākos. Nozagts tālrunis ved viņus ekspedīcijā uz Ņujorkas noziedzīgās pagrīdes centru un ne tikai. Patiesība, kas slēpjas aiz asinsizliešanas, viņus pilnībā apstulbina.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Klusās Misūri štata Noelas iedzīvotāji ir šokēti - vietējā banka tiek aplaupīta nekaunīgā nakts laupīšanā. Izmeklēšanā notiek pavērsiena punkts, kad bankas prezidents tiek atrasts miris un brāļu pāris pēkšņi nonāk pie lielas naudas.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Veiksmīgā ārste un divu bērnu māte Terēza Sīversa atrasta līdz nāvei piekauta savā virtuvē pēc atgriešanās mājās no ģimenes atvaļinājuma. Kriminālistikas analīze un novērošanas kameru video aizved izmeklētājus pie šokējošiem pierādījumiem.

programme.title: Slepkavas motīvs
programme.desc: Populāra terapeite vienā dienā ir pilnīgi vesela, bet jau nākamajā nomirst sāpīgā nāvē. Kad ārsti atklāj viņas nāves iemeslu, kas nav dabīgs, policijai jāsāk meklēt, kurš un kāpēc vēlējās šīs sievietes nāvi.

programme.title: Nāvīgās attiecības ar Feitu Dženkinu
programme.desc: Drīz pēc tam, kad Ketija un Džefs Lembs atjauno laulību, Ketija tiek atrasta viņu mājās piekauta līdz nāvei. Tā kā pāra trīs suņi ir vienīgie liecinieki, detektīvi šķetina vairākas sarežģītas attiecības, lai atrastu viņas slepkavu.

programme.title: Algota slepkavība
programme.desc: Liktenīgs noziegums paliek neatrisināts. Lieta nonāk strupceļā, līdz apņēmīgs detektīvs aizdomās sāk turēt algotu slepkavu. Policisti plāno slepenu operāciju, lai identificētu vainīgo, tomēr viņiem ir tikai viena iespēja viņu notvert.

programme.title: Ņujorkas slepkavība
programme.desc: Ievērojams krievu uzņēmējs pazūd no neparastas apkaimes Steitenailendā. Izmeklētāji uzskata, ka vainojamas krievu bandas. Lietā tiek veikta virkne pagriezienu, lai atklātu visticamākos aizdomās turamos.

programme.title: Slepkavojošie radi
programme.desc: Klusās Misūri štata Noelas iedzīvotāji ir šokēti - vietējā banka tiek aplaupīta nekaunīgā nakts laupīšanā. Izmeklēšanā notiek pavērsiena punkts, kad bankas prezidents tiek atrasts miris un brāļu pāris pēkšņi nonāk pie lielas naudas.

programme.title: Sekss un slepkavības
programme.desc: Veiksmīgā ārste un divu bērnu māte Terēza Sīversa atrasta līdz nāvei piekauta savā virtuvē pēc atgriešanās mājās no ģimenes atvaļinājuma. Kriminālistikas analīze un novērošanas kameru video aizved izmeklētājus pie šokējošiem pierādījumiem.

programme.title: Duo Mix
programme.desc: Nakts programma ar mūzikas video dažādām gaumēm. Dejojiet, dziediet līdzi vai izbaudiet, guļot zem segas.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Klāt gada aizraujošākais laiks Vitlokā: Durbina dzimšanas diena un Garu nedēļa. Džeks dara visu iespējamo, lai izvairītos no skolas gara, bet visi pārējie pulcējas, lai apkarotu savus nīstos konkurentus no Prērijas skolas.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Koledžu izstāde ierodas Vitlokā, un Sarikai ir piedāvājums Džekam: tikt Hārvardā, un viņa iegūs viņa grāmatu savas izdevējas rokās; Stefa gatavojas svinībām; Helēna piesakās koledžā.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: 2. daļa "Inside Probe" izmeklēšanā, kurā stāsta par Crab Shack pazušanu un atkāj jaunus faktus.

programme.title: Mani sauc Erls
programme.desc: 2. daļa "Inside Probe" izmeklēšanā, kurā stāsta par Crab Shack pazušanu un atkāj jaunus faktus.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Bērni ieradušies Dunder Mifflin uz gadskārtējo bērnu dienu darbā. Maikls ir pārsteigts, labi satiekot ar Tobija meitu. Pema izmisīgi mēģina sadraudzēties ar kolēģa meitu, bet Raiens nokļūst zem Stenlija lupas.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Svinot savu dzimšanas dienu, Maikls visus ielūdz uz obligātu slidotavas apmeklējumu.

programme.desc: 2. daļa "Inside Probe" izmeklēšanā, kurā stāsta par Crab Shack pazušanu un atkāj jaunus faktus.

programme.desc: 2. daļa "Inside Probe" izmeklēšanā, kurā stāsta par Crab Shack pazušanu un atkāj jaunus faktus.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Henks Hūpers draud pārtraukt "TGS", bet Džeks pārliecina viņu ļaut Lizai un kompānijai parādīt savu 100. sēriju. Lai radītu vislabāko iespējamo šovu, Lizai jātiek galā ar ne visai ideāliem darba apstākļiem. Gatavojoties izrādei, Džeks sāk šaubīties par svarīgu lēmumu savā dzīvē, bet Dženna apsver iespēju kļūt par māti.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Lizas vasaras atvaļinājums tiek izbojāts - uzrodas Treisijs.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Robertam ir saķeršanās ar bulli, un viņam kādu laiku jāpaliek kopā ar Mariju un Frenku.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Rejs nejauši pa virsu kāzu videoierakstam pārraksta futbola spēli, kā rezultātā Debra ir ļoti saniknota.

programme.title: Jaunais Šeldons
programme.desc: Azartspēļu istabā ielaužas, un Šeldons vēlas studēt ārzemēs. Misija iegūst jaunu draugu.

programme.title: Jaunais Šeldons
programme.desc: Mendija pārsteidz Džordžiju ar spa nedēļas nogali. Šeldons gatavojas vasarai Vācijā.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Džeks ir vīlies popkorna gatavošanas ierīcē, ko pasūtījis, tādēļ viņš un studenti plāno atriebties; Helēna atgriežas skolā, lai iegūtu vidusskolas grādu, bet viņas prombūtnes laikā direktora Durbina birojā iestājas haoss.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Pjū kungs plāno ekskursiju uz Ohaio dabaszinātņu Toledo nodaļu. Džeks nevar uzrakstīt pats savu grāmatu, tādēļ viņš piekrīt būt populārā autora Robina Švanka rakstnieks, lai tikai ievietotu Švanka grāmatā savas nodaļas.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Rejs mēģina iepazīt Alijas mīļāko kāršu spēli.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Beidzot Debrai padevusies laba maltīte, bet Marija tā dēļ saniknojas.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liza cenšas atturēt nosodošo Džeku no sava jaunā puiša, Treisijs sāk "idiotu protestu", atbildot uz Lizas publiskiem komentāriem, bet Kenets un Dženna nejauši salauž luminiscences spuldžu kasti noliktavā.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Publiska izgāšanās liek 20 gadus vecajai alkoholiķei Semai pārcelties atpakaļ mājās kopā ar savu valdošo māti Kerolu. Faktoru ieskauta, kas lika viņai dzert, Sema cenšas pārvarēt savu sliktāko "es" un izdomāt savu labāko "es".

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Neveikla sadursme ar savu bijušo labāko draugu un bijušo iedvesmo Semu tikt galā ar savām pagātnes kļūdām gan emocionāli, gan finansiāli. Atjaunojot attiecības ar māti, Sema šausmās uzzina, ka Kerolai ir attiecības.

programme.title: Jaunais Šeldons
programme.desc: Mendija pārsteidz Džordžiju ar spa nedēļas nogali. Šeldons gatavojas vasarai Vācijā.

programme.title: Jaunais Šeldons
programme.desc: Ziņas par tornado sasniedz Šeldonu un Mēriju Vācijā. Arī Kūpera mājā valda haoss, Misija pauž nostāju.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Nadjas naktskluba atklāšanas diena ir apdraudēta - savu uzstāšanos atcēlis kāds ievērojams mūziķis.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Vampīri devušies ceļojumā uz slepeno Nakts tirgu, kur uz tirgošanos un laika kopā pavadīšanu satiekas visas pārdabiskās būtnes.

programme.desc: Publiska izgāšanās liek 20 gadus vecajai alkoholiķei Semai pārcelties atpakaļ mājās kopā ar savu valdošo māti Kerolu. Faktoru ieskauta, kas lika viņai dzert, Sema cenšas pārvarēt savu sliktāko "es" un izdomāt savu labāko "es".

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Neveikla sadursme ar savu bijušo labāko draugu un bijušo iedvesmo Semu tikt galā ar savām pagātnes kļūdām gan emocionāli, gan finansiāli. Atjaunojot attiecības ar māti, Sema šausmās uzzina, ka Kerolai ir attiecības.

programme.title: Jaunais Šeldons
programme.desc: Mendija pārsteidz Džordžiju ar spa nedēļas nogali. Šeldons gatavojas vasarai Vācijā.

programme.title: Jaunais Šeldons
programme.desc: Ziņas par tornado sasniedz Šeldonu un Mēriju Vācijā. Arī Kūpera mājā valda haoss, Misija pauž nostāju.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Džeks nejauši zaudē ievērojamu naudas summu, un tā nonāk studentu rokā. Direktors Durbins un Helēna izmeklē, kurš nozadzis naudu, bet skolēni un skolotāji atzīst citus pārkāpumus.

programme.title: Bioloģijas kurss
programme.desc: Direktors Durbins pēc Džeka filozofijas grāmatas izdošanas pārvēršas par varaskāru maniaku.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Frenks un Marija sadraudzējas ar pāri, kam ir līdzīgas personības.

programme.title: Visi mīl Reimondu
programme.desc: Debra uz laiku vēlas palikt viena. Rejs prāto, kādēļ tā.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Dunder Mifflin komanda noliktavā sarīko kazino ballīti, un Maiklam ir divi randiņi.

programme.title: Ofiss
programme.desc: Uzzinot par orientāciju, Maikls atvainojas Oskaram par viņa nosaukšanu nejaukos vārdos. Tomēr viņa atvainošanās saceļ kājās visu biroju. Džims nolemj pieņemt paaugstinājumu un doties uz Stemfordu.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: Divarpus vīri
programme.desc: Pēc brāļa nāves Alans Halpers saticis un iedraudzējies ar jaunu vientuļnieku Valdenu Šimtu, kas izrādās ir miljardieris. Alans pārdod Valdenam māju, un, parādot pateicību, Valdens ļauj Alanam ar viņa dēlu Džeiku ievākties pie viņiem.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Liza cenšas atturēt nosodošo Džeku no sava jaunā puiša, Treisijs sāk "idiotu protestu", atbildot uz Lizas publiskiem komentāriem, bet Kenets un Dženna nejauši salauž luminiscences spuldžu kasti noliktavā.

programme.title: 30 Rock
programme.desc: Džeks oficiāli neatbalsta Lizas draugu, Treisijs turpina protestu, Devins Benkss ​​atgriežas, lai šantažētu Džeku, lai viņa bērni iestātos prestižā skolā, un Kelsija Gremere izved Džennu un Kenetu no sarežģītās situācijas.

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Sema cenšas iekarot Britu, izdarot uzlabojumus viņas dzimšanas dienas ballītē. Diemžēl Sema netika uzaicināta, un viņa atstāj Felisiju novārtā. Tikmēr, kad ierodas Semas probācijas dienesta darbinieks, Kerola cenšas saviem draugiem izskaidrot Semas "situāciju".

programme.title: Vientuļā dzērusī sieviete
programme.desc: Sema saskaras ar savu līdz šim grūtāko izaicinājumu - izvairīties no alkohola Svētā Patrika dienā Bostonā; Brita dod Semai negaidītu iespēju atjaunot viņu draudzību; Džeimss un Mindija meklē viņa pazaudētās atslēgas, cīnoties ar Svētā Patrika dienas kārdinājumiem.

programme.title: Jaunais Šeldons
programme.desc: Šeldons saprot, ka ir vājākais students savā klasē. Mīmava lūko, kā attīstīt savu azartspēļu biznesu.

programme.title: Jaunais Šeldons
programme.desc: Šeldons izzina Vāciju aiz Mērijas muguras. Misija mēģina ātri izdarīt lietas ar Džordžu vecāko. Mīmova un Deils pielāgojas kopdzīvei.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Vampīri uzsākuši privātskolas interviju procesu.

programme.title: Kas notiek krēslā
programme.desc: Giljermo pazaudē prātu, cenšoties palīdzēt Nandorai izplānot perfektas vampīru kāzas.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mis Mārpla atrodas uz tropiskās Sv. Honora salas. Kad kāds viesnīcas viesis majors Palgarve mirst drīz pēc ierašanās, Mārplu nepārliecina oficiālā versija par sirdslēkmi.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad tiek noslepkavots vīrietis, kurš atgādina Mērdoku, detektīvs veic izmeklēšanu, vienlaikus uzraugot savu un mazuļa Suzannas drošību.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pēc spridzekļa atrašanas viņu mājās Mērdoks ir nodrošinājis Ogdenu un mazuli Sūzannu kādā nomāktajā viesnīcā ar panikas pogu, kamēr viņš dzenā draudus.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: 1964. g.: kad pazūd slavenā tante, kuru viņa nekad nepazina, Peregrīna Fišere manto negaidītu laimi un viņai jāpierāda, ka ir pietiekami apdāvināta, lai pati kļūtu par pasaules līmeņa privātdetektīvu.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pēc tam, kad tiek noslepkavots vīrietis, kurš atgādina Mērdoku, detektīvs veic izmeklēšanu, vienlaikus uzraugot savu un mazuļa Suzannas drošību.

programme.title: Mis Fišeres modernie izmeklēšanas noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pēc modeles Bārbijas Džounsas un modes dizaineres Florences Astores dubultslepkavībām Peregrīna izmanto savas nepārbaudītās un neparastās prasmes, lai mēģinātu notvert viņu slepkavu, pirms viņi atkal uzbrūk.

programme.title: Lielas un mazas radības
programme.desc: Šī ir nozīmīga diena Tristanam, taču sāpīgs noslēpums draud izjaukt svinības un Džeimsa centieni aizsargāt Helēnu no savām problēmām tikai pasliktina situāciju.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Pēc tantes briesmīgā pareģojuma Krebtrī pamet Efiju pie altāra. Viņš cer, ka šāds žests glābs viņas dzīvību, pat ja pašam ir salauzta sirds, tomēr viņa uzvedība pārsteidz Mērdoku.

programme.title: Mērdoka noslēpumi
programme.desc: Kad Mērdokam ir aizdomas, ka Vaileta Hārta melo par sava tēva nāvi, Ogdenas novērojumi apstiprina viņa pieņēmumus.

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla

programme.title: Agatas Kristi Mārpla
programme.desc: Mis Mārpla atrod draudzenei darbu netālu esošajā Grīnšovas folijā. Kad vairāki biedri tiek atrasti miruši, aizdomās tiek turēti visi, un neviens nevar iedomāties, kādus noslēpumus atklās Džeina.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Atvaļināts arheologs, vikāra sieva un vietējais suņu staidzinātājs izveido neticamu draudzību, vienlaikus cīnoties ar laiku, lai apturētu sērijveida slepkavu savā pilsētā.

programme.title: Mēnessakmens
programme.desc: Pēc dimanta pazušanas Franklins izsauc slaveno detektīvu Kafu uz Jorkšīru, bet satriektā Reičela dodas uz Londonu, liekot sevi turēt aizdomās.

programme.title: Mēnessakmens
programme.desc: Seriāla darbība norisinās Viktorijas laikmeta Anglijā, kur Reičela Verindere mantojumā saņem dārgu Indijas dimantu, kas pazūd tajā pašā vakarā.

programme.title: Skārletas jaunkundze un Velingtons
programme.desc: Viktoriāņi bija apsēsti ar nāvi un spiritismu. Šajā sērijā Elīzu nolīgst mirušo fotogrāfs, kurš saņem savādas un draudpilnas vēstules no mirušo pasaules.

programme.title: Mārlova slepkavību klubs
programme.desc: Pārsteidzoša saikne ar kādu pazuduša cilvēka lietu liek no jauna paskatīties uz vietējiem iedzīvotājiem, tomēr, vai kāds no viņiem tiešām varētu būt izdarījis slepkavību?

programme.title: Premier League. West Ham United - Chelsea
Почта
programme.desc: В почтовое отделение на должность экспедитора устраивается Елена (40 лет). Экспедитор Андрей (45) не очень доволен новой напарницей, он не доверяет женщинам за рулем. Но со временем между Еленой и Андреем возникает симпатия. И не без стараний со стороны их детей – Юли и Глеба. Андрей – одинокий папа, Елена - одинокая мама, казалось бы, ничего не может помешать их отношениям… Но тайны и ошибки прошлого сыграют с ними злую шутку… Бушуют страсти и в почтовом отделении. Руководитель отделения Артем (30) покоряет вершины почтовой карьеры и не желает замечать сотрудницу отделения Милану (25), которая мечтает заполучить его сердце. Мама Артема и его младший брат Гена также вносят в жизнь отделения свои коррективы… Все герои ежедневно сталкиваются с нестандартными ситуациями, но не остаются равнодушными к проблемам людей-клиентов почтового отделения, помогая им выпутаться из сложных историй…

programme.title: Remembrance
programme.desc: Remembrance depicts a remarkable love story that blossomed amidst the terror of a German concentration camp in 1944 Poland. This impossible passion fuels the courage of a Polish prisoner who manages to rescue his Jewish girlfriend. Against all odds, they escape the camp and survive a treacherous journey to freedom. But during the chaos of the end of the war, they are forcibly separated and each is convinced that the other has died. More than thirty years later in New York, the happily married 52-year-old woman accidentally finds out that her former Polish lover is still alive. And she has to see him again.

programme.title: Fatal Sin
programme.desc: A boy and a girl fall in love. But on the night they met, she was drunk and stoned and he toke advantage of her. Although she does not remember almost anything from that night, she remembers something that may compromise their relationship.

programme.title: Shaka Zulu: The Citadel
programme.desc: Prentice Mungo (David Hasselhoff) is a slave-trader who discovers that his ship is carrying a stowaway, Katherine (Karen Allen). Katherine is seeking passage to Africa to see her father, a British officer stationed there. But when they arrive, Mungo discovers Shaka, king of the Zulu tribe, among the slaves he is going to be transporting. Using his cleverness and leadership abilities, Zulu incites the slaves to revolt, and takes Katherine captive as he flees into the African countryside.

programme.title: Caesar
programme.desc: Epic look at Julius Caesar, Romes last dictator, whose death also signaled the end of the Roman Republic. Chronicles his campaigns in Gaul and Egypt, his rivalry with General Pompey, and his eventual assassination at the hands of Brutus and Cassius.

programme.title: The Lucky Dragon
programme.desc: A young, Chinese dragon punished by the gods to be a mere mortal is cast down to earth. He is forced to make his way in a strange land until the evil forces discover his true identity. Take part in a world full of imagination while following the journey of a mischievous dragon who has been transformed by magic into a little boy and exiled from his home to live among humans. When both good and evil forces learn that a dragon has arrived, they look for him as he is the only one who can find the magical sword—whose owner can rule the universe! Will he find the sword in time before it gets into the wrong hands? Will he ever become a dragon again?

programme.title: Uncle Nino
programme.desc: A distant, slightly dysfunctional family is brought closer together when the fathers long-estranged Uncle Nino comes from Italy to Chicago for a surprise visit.

programme.title: Raspberry Magic
programme.desc: "Raspberry Magic" is a coming-of-age story about 11-year-old Monica Shah, who thinks she must win the science fair in order to bring her father back after he runs out on the family. She blames herself for her parents problems, and takes charge when her mother falls into a deep depression. Set behind the backdrop of a beautiful forest, Monicas experiment uses touch therapy to help raspberries grow faster. She asks, is it nature or nurture that can truly help a being grow? Does it even matter? Through her ups and downs with her family, she learns that its a complex question, and the answer isnt so simple.

programme.title: Guido Superstar: The Rise of Guido
programme.desc: An Italian immigrant is thrust into the world of drug-lords, supercars and secret agents in this hilarious action comedy. After losing his job at the Disco Valet Company for undue heroism, Guido (Silvio Pollio) must pose as a Sicilian gangster for the FBI in order to infiltrate a powerful Asian gang. Things go sour and take a turn for the worse. Guido must now make amends before he is discovered and killed, or worse, deported.

programme.title: The Ambassador to Bern
programme.desc: Attila Szaszs political thriller portraying the events of the hostage taking of the Hungarian ambassador to Switzerland in the aftermath of the 1956 Hungarian Revolution. The film was presented at numerous festivals all over the world. It won the Frederico Fellini Award at Tiburon International Film Festival.

programme.title: Talea
programme.desc: Summertime. Everybody is excited to go on vacation to Italy. Everybody but Jasmin. Jasmin is yearning something. She wants to be with Eva, her mother, from whom she had to live seperately for a long time. For weeks, Jasmin is trying to get close to Eva. She does not give up, even if shes rejected. After an argument, Jasmin runs away from her fosterhome and convinces Eva to leave the city together and go on a trip. The two get closer -- sometimes as friends, sometimes as mother and daughter. A first joint cigarette, a dance in the village disco, wanderings through the woods. But expectations and needs of the girl and her mother are diverging repeatedly, especially when a man attracts Evas attention and disturbs the growing closeness between mother and daughter.

programme.title: Almost Friends
programme.desc: Charlie, a culinary genius, has lost the motivation. He doesnt know what to with his life anymore, but he knows one thing - get close to Amber. In comparison to her boyfriend, he seems to be totally unattractive, but Charlies closest friend convinces him that where theres a will theres a way.

programme.title: Lost in Florence
programme.desc: A heartbroken American in Florence gets involved in a dangerous local sport -- and with an alluring local woman.

programme.title: Love Is Not Enough
programme.desc: Samir, must face his parents breakup. While they meet to find the way to tell him, the little Samir surprises them, because he knows perfectly whats happening, putting his own parents into a hard place with his vision of the situation.

programme.title: Night Class
programme.desc: When Jake, a security guard in a small hotel, inadvertently helps out a beautiful burglar, he becomes a primary suspect and is quickly fired. Jake decides to track down the burglar himself and retrieve the stolen property.

programme.title: The 51st State
programme.desc: An American master chemist plans to score big on a once in a lifetime drug deal. All does not go as planned and he is soon entangled in a web of deceit.

programme.title: Shoreditch
programme.desc: Set both on the eve of World War II in a shady Shoreditch nightclub and in present-day London. Thirtysomething Tom tries to solve a murder that was committed in the club decades before.

programme.title: Caesar
programme.desc: Epic look at Julius Caesar, Romes last dictator, whose death also signaled the end of the Roman Republic. Chronicles his campaigns in Gaul and Egypt, his rivalry with General Pompey, and his eventual assassination at the hands of Brutus and Cassius.

programme.title: Suits on the Loose
programme.desc: Two rebellious teens, on the run from a desert survival camp, steal the car of two naive Mormon missionaries. They end up in New Harmony, the town thats been anxiously awaiting their Mormon missionaries.

programme.title: Unknown Energies, Unidentified Emotions
programme.desc: A hybrid of animated, experimental, feature and genre film in found footage technique, with a radio phonic sound and of unexpected, almost 40-minute duration. Journalist Isidor Dukas visits the Institute for Research on Psychic Phenomena and Mental Film when a confrontation with one of the test subjects transforms a routine check into a never-ending maze. Barićs work calls into question issues surrounding artistic practices in the digital age including ideas about authenticity, simulation/replication and appropriation.

programme.title: Baba
programme.desc: An weird but witty old woman is forced to deal with an ambiguous future after her country, family and the entire system of values are ruined. She is trying to solve her existential problems catching d trying to sell a rewarded war criminal as he was a rabbit in a wood. The only thing she did not know if he is really him.

programme.title: Among Thieves
programme.desc: Three friends - a reporter, an oil analyst and a financial executive - reunite after ten years and accidentally uncover one of the key, hidden reasons for what motivated the war in Iraq. The trio struggles to present evidence to major media that America invaded Iraq to force oil sales from the Euro back to the Dollar to preserve US global monetary supremacy. Against incredible odds, the team must face their pasts, find willing sources to corroborate the story, and survive the conspirators as they push to bring the truth to light.

programme.title: 10 Things We Should Do Before We Break Up
programme.desc: Abigail, a self-sufficient single mom meets Ben. They both think every great relationship ends in disaster. On the first date they come up with 10 things to do together before they break up. But the estimated end is not so sure - because fate adds #11 to their list.

programme.title: Above and Beyond
programme.desc: Two cop partners, who are also best friends attend a domestic disturbance, only for one to accidentaly critically wound the other. The rest of the police force are suspicious that there may have been no accident.

programme.title: Field of Lost Shoes
programme.desc: Based on a true story of the American Civil War, culminating at the Battle of New Market, May 1864. A group of teenage cadets sheltered from war at the Virginia Military Institute must confront the horrors of an adult world when they are called upon to defend the Shenandoah Valley. Leaving behind their youth, these cadets must decide what they are fighting for.

programme.title: Riot
programme.desc: Copper Jack Stone purposefully orchestrates a bank robbery in order to be thrown into prison with the notorious Russian kingpin Balam. Balam is more than just a mob criminal; hes a very cunning and dangerous lord who controls the police force from behind bars. Balam lives in prison as a cover for his real power, which is King of the city. His cell is a lavish private room built specifically for him, inaccessible to most in the depths of the prison structure. Even the warden fears venturing into his area of the prison. However, even surrounded by his loyal henchmen and guards in his sectioned off fortress, Balam doesnt know Jack is coming for him to avenge his family, who Balam murdered in cold blood. Balam is tough... but Jack is tougher.

programme.title: Diamond Dogs
programme.desc: A mercenary is hired to protect an expedition group while they search for a Buddhist tapestry worth millions of dollars. However, as they descend deeper into the jungle, more and more members mysteriously vanish.

programme.title: Get the Girl
programme.desc: Calvin Jones works at a boring and whimsical office job while searching for meaning to his life and decides that means winning the affections of the office hottie Britney. Calvin struggles mightily to capture the true words to express his feelings, but can not.

programme.title: Stranger Than Fiction
programme.desc: Lives spiral out of control when four friends cover up a murder.

programme.title: No Limit Kids
programme.desc: Ashton, Celeste, and Becca are three unlikely middle school outcasts who form a club in an abandoned theater. There, they meet Charlie (Bill Cobbs, Night at the Museum), a homeless man who shares their passion for musical theater. When the theater is scheduled to be torn down, the teenagers set out to save the landmark with a modern-day performance of Shakespeares Much Ado About Nothing. Along the way, the group learns to treat others with respect and stand up for their beliefs. This Dove-approved film also features Emmy and Golden Globe nominee Lee Meriwether.

programme.title: Simona
programme.desc: Kinorežisoram Viktoram Taranskim ir apnikušas aktieru mūžīgās kaprīzes un ultimāti. Bet nu viņš ir atradis ideālu aktrisi - visskaistāko, vistalantīgāko, kas nekad neiebilst un nekad neko neprasa. Tiešām žēl, ka Simone eksistē... tikai virtuāli, nav nekas vairāk kā datora kods, nulles un vieninieki. Taču arī savus straujos panākumus Taranskis apturēt nevēlas, īstenībā neeksistējošās aktrises faniem vilšanos sagādāt negrib, tāpēc cenšas saglabāt intrigu un neatklāt patiesību cik vien iespējams ilgi.

programme.title: Spoža talanta nepanesamais smagums
programme.desc: Nikolass Keidžs jūtas radoši nepiepildīts un atrodas bankrota priekšā, tomēr cer iegūt lomu jaunākajā Tarantino filmā. Lai nopelnītu miljonu dolāru, viņš piekrīt piedalīties sava fana miljardiera dzimšanas dienas ballītē.

programme.title: La La Land. Kalifornijas sapņi
programme.desc: Mia ir topošā aktrise, kas piestrādā kafejnīcā, pasniedzot latte kafijas filmu zvaigznēm. Viņas mīļotais ir Sebastians, džeza mūziķis, kas mēģina savilkt galus, uzstājoties ar koncertiem šaubīgos un noplukušos bāros. Panākumiem pieaugot, jaunais mīlnieku pāris saskaras ar lēmumiem, kas sāk graut viņu mīlestību. Sapņi, pie kuriem viņi strādājuši tik smagi, nu viņus var izšķirt!

programme.title: Naudas monstrs
programme.desc: Finanšu raidījumu vadītājs Lī Geits un viņa producente Petija nonāk ekstrēmā situācijā - kāds investors viņus un viņu komandu paņem gūstā.

programme.title: Grūtie laiki viesnīcā "El Royale"
programme.desc: 1969. gads. Viesnīcā "El Royale" ir apmetusies ļoti raiba kompānija - nīgrs mācītājs, dziedātāja, enerģisks putekļu sūcēju pārdevējs un arī aizdomīga meiča no Dienvidiem. Katram no viņiem ir savi noslēpumi un katram būs iespēja izpirkt savus pagātnes grēkus.

programme.title: Trakā, dullā mīlestība
programme.desc: Kals Vīvers ir veiksminieks - viņam ir lielisks darbs, sapņu māja, jauki bērni un mīļotā sieva, ar kuru viņš iepazinās jau vidusskolā. Tomēr, kad Kals uzzina, ka sieva viņu krāpj un pieprasa šķiršanos, viņa ideālā dzīve mainās līdz nepazīšanai.

programme.title: Ananasu ekspresis
programme.desc: KĀds vīrs un viņa marihuānas tirgotājs aizbēg no slepkavām un korumpēta policista. Viņš kļuvis par liecinieku tam, kā viņa tirgotāja boss nogalina konkurentu.

programme.desc: Lai izturētu Gestapo psiholoģisko teroru, nacistu ieslodzīts jurists mieru atrod šaha pasaulē.

programme.title: Mis Saulstariņš
programme.desc: Uz ekrāniem filma par vienu visdīvainākajām ģimenēm kino vēsturē - Hūveriem. Lai piepildītu jaunākās meitas Olivas sapni piedalīties skaistuma un talantu konkursā, viņi dodas ceļā uz Kaliforniju.

programme.title: 24 In
programme.desc: The chefs make spicy street food and a finale-worthy fish dish for judge Andrew Zimmern to earn a spot in the final shift.

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out
programme.desc: Just how far is a chef willing to go to win a cooking competition? Hosted by Brian Malarkey, Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out hands four chefs each $25,000 and the opportunity to spend that money on helping themselves or sabotaging their competitors. Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Dinner: Impossible

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Rachel Khoos Simple Pleasures
programme.desc: Cooking doesnt have to be difficult, nor does it require extravagant ingredients that are hard to find. From her home kitchen in Sweden, Rachel Khoo shares her secrets to cooking, providing viewers with delectable recipes created from easy-to-source ingredients, and guaranteeing enjoyment when it comes to rustling up dinner. Though her recipes are laced with simplicity, they are packed with flavour and she encourages viewers to recreate these mouthwatering fares.

programme.title: Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out
programme.desc: Just how far is a chef willing to go to win a cooking competition? Hosted by Brian Malarkey, Cutthroat Kitchen: Knives Out hands four chefs each $25,000 and the opportunity to spend that money on helping themselves or sabotaging their competitors. Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

Ingredients will be thieved, utensils destroyed and valuable time on the clock lost when the chefs compete to cook delicious dishes while also having to outplot the competition. Nothing is out of bounds when money changes hands and we see just how far chefs will go to ensure they have the winning dish.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives
programme.desc: Diners, Drive-Ins and Dives is American food reality television series about places with the most delicious food. The host is American restaurateur Guy Fieri who travels along the USA, Canada or Europe looking for the most fascinating cafes and introduces them to the viewers. Each show has a specific focus on a certain dish, like burgers, pasta, comfort food. Small cafes with traditional food and home-style recipes or ethnic specialties adored by the locals are of particular interest to the host. Guy Fieri enters the kitchen, gets to know the cook, actively takes part in cooking, interacts with the guests and kitchen staff and gives his humorous spicy comments on the process and the food itself.

programme.title: Chopped
programme.desc: Chopped is an American reality cooking TV game show hosted by Ted Allen. Four chefs compete against each other. At the beginning of each round they receive a basket containing four mystery ingredients and are expected to create the best three-course meal using every single one of them. Each round has a time limit. The dishes are judged based on their presentation, taste and creativity. At the end of every round one chef is "chopped" from the competition with no prize. The winner can get up to $50.000.

programme.title: Dinner: Impossible
programme.desc: Thrill-Seekers. Robert Irvine is at the world-famous Cedar Point amusement park in Sandusky, Ohio, to make dinner for 150 superfans celebrating the parks 150th anniversary.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: The Pioneer Woman
programme.desc: Ree Drummon is a writer, photographer, ranch wife and mother of four. She is the host of cooking show The Pioneer Woman. She cooks in a simple, easy to follow way at her ranch in Pawhuska, Oklahoma. We can learn new techniques and get new ideas in a down to earth way and feed even big families every day with dishes that are both yummy and healthy. It is surprisingly easy to cook following her recipes step by step. Her passion for cooking is appreciated by more than 22 million of people all over the world.

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Beat Bobby Flay
programme.desc: Beat Bobby Flay is an exciting American Cooking show in which two contestants create mouth watering dishes in competition with each other, for the chance to go head to head with the one and only Bobby Flay himself. Flay gets to pick one key ingredient that the contestants must use before the winner is decided by guests of the show. The winner of the first round must then beat Flay in a 45 minute round. The overall winner is then decided by a panel of celebrity judges. So the question is, who can beat the Flayster?

programme.title: Kids Baking Championship
programme.desc: Join the contestants as they compete for the title of Kids Baking Champion, and a grand prize of up to $25,000. Hosted and judged by actress Valerie Bartinelli and celebrity baker Duff Goldman, the children are tasked with a number of difficult baking challenges, serving up mouth-wateringly delicious sweet and savoury treats. With up to 12 children hoping to prove theyre the best young baker in the competition, each contestant must showcase their incredible culinary skills in order to impress the judges and take home the title.

programme.title: The Last Day of the Dictator
Motobraucēji
programme.desc: Pēc nejaušas tikšanās pārgalvīgo Ketiju piesaista Benijs, Vidusrietumu motokluba "Vandals" biedrs. Klubam pārtopot par bīstamu vardarbības perēkli, Benijam ir jāizvēlas starp Ketiju un viņa lojalitāti klubam.

programme.title: Argentīna,
programme.desc: Sacenšoties ar laiku, 80. gados juristu komanda neticamā cīņā cenšas atmaskot Argentīnas asiņainās militārās diktatūras vadītājus.

programme.title: Kliedziens
programme.desc: "Scream" turpinājumā Ghostface slepkavībās izdzīvojušie atstāj Vudsboro un sāk jaunu dzīvi Ņujorkā.

programme.title: Cietais tērauds
programme.desc: Ne pārāk tālā nākotnē populārākais sporta veids ir bokss, kurā piedalās tikai roboti. Kāds boksa menedžeris, kuram pēdējā laikā nav īpaši veicies, atrod visu aizmirstu robotu un ir pārliecināts, ka tas ir nākamais čempions. Laikā, kad viņa slava sāk pieaugt, vīrietis atklāj, ka viņam ir 11 gadus vecs dēls, kurš vēlas iepazīt savu tēvu.

programme.title: Blūmu ģimenes stāsts
programme.desc: Sema ir aktīvā dzīvesveida piekritēja, taču ģimenes ceļojumā pa Taizemi notiek nelaime – viņa neveiksmīgi nokrīt no balkona, savaino mugurkaulu un paliek daļēji paralizēta. Semas vīrs, trīs dēli un māte visādi mēģina palīdzēt un uzmundrināt sievieti, kura ir zaudējusi dzīvesprieku un slīgst arvien dziļāk depresīvā noskaņojumā. Pēkšņi mājas pagalmā uzrodas ievainots žagatas mazulis, kuru ģimene adoptē un nosauc par Pingvīnu. Neviens gan nebija iedomājies, ka tieši Pingvīns būs tas, kurš palīdzēs Semai atkal saskatīt dzīvei jēgu un atgūt optimismu.

programme.title: Marmelāde
programme.desc: Filma par kādu ieslodzīto, kurš ar savu veiklo kameras biedru dalās paša izdomātā krāšņā, romantiskā bankas aplaupīšanas stāstā un izbēg, apvienojoties ar savas dzīves mīlestību.

programme.title: Pa dona Kihota pēdām
programme.desc: "Pa dona Kihota pēdām" ir neparasts un piedzīvojumu pilns ceļojums visai ģimenei, kas seko 11 gadus vecajam Alfonso, dona Kihota mantiniekam, un viņa trīs iedomātajiem trušiem, kuriem piebiedrojas Pančo un Viktorija. Ar savas draudzības spēku viņi izglābj no milzu vētras savu mīļoto pilsētu kaut kur Lamančā. Viņi sapņo neiespējamu sapni, pārvar bailes un izmanto savu iztēli, lai atklātu īsto vētras cēloni.

programme.title: Viena dzīve
programme.desc: Stāsts par seru Nikolasu Nicky Vintonu, kurš, būdams jauns Londonas brokeris, pirms Otrā pasaules kara sākuma izglāba vairāk nekā 600 bērnus no nacistu okupētās Čehoslovākijas.

programme.title: Čārlija eņģeļi
programme.desc: Noslēpumainā Čārlza Taunsenda detektīvaģentūra atvērusi birojus visā pasaulē. Tās paspārnē vairāku Bosliju vadībā izveidotas Eņģeļu komandas, kurās darbojas visgudrākās, visdrosmīgākās un visaugstāk kvalificētās sievietes, kam jātiek galā ar vissarežģītākajiem uzdevumiem jebkur uz zemeslodes.

programme.title: Mazās sievietes
programme.desc: Filmas darbība norisinās Amerikas Pilsoņu kara laikā un vēsta par četru māsu dzīvi – pirmo mīlestību, vilšanos, šķiršanās sāpēm un sava dzīves ceļa meklējumiem, lietām, kas savu aktualitāti nezaudē visos laikos. Filmas pamatā ir amerikāņu rakstnieces Luīzas Mejas Alkotas tāda paša nosaukuma romāns, kas ir sarakstīts pirms pusotra gadsimta un tiek uzskatīts par īstu žanra klasiku.

programme.title: Dzīve
programme.desc: Šī ir filma par kādu parastu vīrieti, kuru gadiem ilgi nomākusī biroja rutīna novedusi līdz eksistencei ēnā. Tā dēļ vienpadsmitajā stundā viņš pieliek vislielākās pūles, lai pārvērstu savu garlaicīgo dzīvi par kaut ko brīnišķīgu.

programme.title: Mazais izmeklētājs
programme.desc: Reiz atzītais un slavenais mazulis izmeklētājs, kas nu ir kļuvis par 31 gadu vecu, taču dzīvē neveiksmīgu vīrieti, turpina mēģināt atrisināt dažādas triviālas mistērijas, šim arodam pieslēdzoties laika posmos starp paģirām un sevis žēlošanas sesijām. Kādā reizē naiva kliente līdz viņam nogādā kādu "pieaugušo" lietu. Tajā jāizdara kas tāds, ko mazais izmeklētājs līdz šim nav ne spējis, ne darījis – jānoskaidro, kas nogalinājis klienta draugu.

programme.title: Abigeila
programme.desc: Ļaundaru grupa nolaupa ietekmīga noziedzīgās pasaules pārstāvja 12 gadus veco meitu baletdejotāju. Viņu mērķis ir paturēt meiteni ieslodzījumā uz vienu nakti, lai tiktu pie 50 miljonu dolāru lielas izpirkuma maksas. Taču mājā, kurā viņi ir apmetušies, notiek savādas lietas - cits pēc cita pazūd nolaupītāji, un ar pieaugošām šausmām viņi atklāj, ka ir ieslēgti kopā ar kādu, kas nav tipiska maza meitenīte.

programme.title: Maja Ma
programme.desc: Pallavi Patela ir indiešu vidusmēra ģimenes sieva, pazīstama ar savu dejotprasmi un kulinārijas mākslu. Dēla Teja saderināšanās vakars draud izgāzties, jo paklīdušas tenkas par priekšzīmīgo mājsaimnieci Pallavi.

programme.title: Neatrodamā
programme.desc: Piektajā kāzu gadadienā Niks Danns ziņo policijai par savas sievas Eimijas pazušanu. Izmeklētāju spiediena un mediju arvien pieaugošās intereses dēļ Nika stāsts par laimīgo pāri sāk izirt. Drīz vien viņa meli, krāpšanās un savādā uzvedība liek visiem uzdot vienu jautājumu: vai Niks Danns nogalināja savu sievu? Filmas pamatā ir "New York Times" betselleru autores Džilianas Flinnas darbs.

programme.title: Ugunīgi ass
programme.desc: Iedvesmojošs stāsts par Ričardu Montaņezu, uzkodu ražotāja "Frito Lay" apkopēju, kurš, pateicoties savai meksikāņu izcelsmei, sapurināja pārtikas industriju, palīdzot radīt vienus no visu laiku populārākajiem čipsiem "Flamin Hot Cheetos".

programme.title: 200 % vilks
programme.desc: Kad Freda Lupina vēlēšanās piepildās ne tā, kā viņš to paredzējis, vilciņš pārvēršas par vilkati un uz Zemes nonāk palaidnīgs Mēness gariņš. Nu Fredijam jādara viss, lai atjaunotu kosmisko kārtību, pirms Zeme sadursies ar Mēnesi.

programme.title: Varenais Ričards
programme.desc: Ričards ir jauns zvirbulēns, kuru savā lokā pieņēmusi stārķu ģimene. Viņš pavada ziemu Āfrikas ziemeļos, taču ir pienācis laiks atgriezties mājās. Ričards vēlas vadīt gājputnu kāsi, bet šim uzdevumam tiek izraudzīts viņa pusbrālis Makss. Jaunais putnēns jūtas aizvainots, taču drīz sākas vētrains piedzīvojums. Tirāniskais pāvs Zamano sagūsta Ričarda draugu. Zamano atsakās viņu laist brīvībā, kamēr Ričards neatrisinās mīklu un neatradīs Zamano dārgakmeni.

programme.title: Pie visa vainīga mīlestība
programme.desc: Žoslēns ir veiksmīgs biznesmenis, toties mīlas dzīvē – patmīlīgs brunču mednieks. Kad viņš mēģina jau atkal savaldzināt jaunu sievieti, izliekoties, ka ir ratiņkrēslā, viņa iepazīstina Žoslēnu ar savu māsu, kura patiešām piesaistīta dzīvei ratiņkrēslā.

programme.title: Singstrīta
programme.desc: Dublina, 1985. gads. Ekonomiskā krīze Īrijā arvien vairāk cilvēku iedzen bankrotā, tikmēr 15 gadus vecais Konors kopā ar brāli un māsu dzīvo pie vecākiem, kuru laulībai draud izjukšana. Lai ietaupītu naudu, Konoram nākas mainīt skolu. Tur viņš ātri vien kļūst par izstumto. Kādu dienu viņš pamana Rafīnu, kura šad tad stāv iepretim skolai, raudzīdamās tālumā un smēķēdama vienu cigareti pēc otras. Viņa ir skaista, divus gadus vecāka par Konoru, viņai ir draugs, un viņa strādā par modeli. Īsāk sakot: viņa ir gandrīz nesasniedzama. Taču Konors nav gatavs padoties un piedāvā meitenei piedalīties viņa grupas videoklipā. Rafīna piekrīt, un Konors ir panikā, jo grupas viņam nemaz nav...

programme.title: Everests
programme.desc: 1996. gada 10. maija rītā divas alpīnistu komandas uzsāk pēdējo posmu ceļā uz Everestu, kas ir pasaules augstākā virsotne. Piepeši kalnu grēdu pārņem negaiss, un piedzīvojumu meklētājiem ceļu aizšķērso cilvēces vēsturē spēcīgākā sniega vētra. Šajos skarbajos apstākļos komandām ir jāiztur stindzinoši brāzmains vējš un mežonīgs aukstums, lai izdzīvotu gandrīz neiespējamā situācijā.

programme.title: Zīmes
programme.desc: Pensilvānijas štatā kopā ar diviem bērniem un brāli Merilinu pavisam mierīgi, neviena netraucēts, dzīvo fermeris Greiems Hess. Taču šo mieru pārtrauc dīvaini notikumi – vispirms kukurūzas laukos parādās gigantiski apļi, un, iespējams, tos tiešām ir radījušas ārpuszemes civilizācijas. Tad ar viņa tuviniekiem sāk notikt dīvainas lietas. Greiemem ir jātiek skaidrībā ar notiekošo, pirms viņa pasaule nav sabrukusi pavisam.

programme.title: Ella un melnais Jaguārs
programme.desc: Pēc daudziem gadiem, kas pavadīti Ņujorkā, 14 gadus vecā Ella atgriežas Amazones lietus mežā, lai glābtu savu bērnības ciematu un mīļoto jaguāru draugu.

programme.title: Lī
programme.desc: Patiesais stāsts par fotogrāfi Elizabeti "Lī" Milleri, modes modeli, kura kļuva par atzītu kara korespondenti Vogue žurnālam Otrā pasaules kara laikā.

programme.title: Putncilvēks
programme.desc: Strauji novecojis, slavas norietā esošs aktieris, kurš reiz atveidoja pasaulē slavenu supervaroni, cīnās ar ģimenes likstām, paša egoismu un citiem šķēršļiem, cenšoties izveidot Brodvejas izrādi, no kuras atkarīga viņa turpmākā karjera un, iespējams, arī dzīve. Mākslas filma ieguva septiņas "Zelta globusa" nominācijas, no kurām saņēma divas – kategorijās "Labākais aktieris mūziklā vai komēdijā" un "Labākais scenārijs", tāpat filma saņēma arī deviņas "Oskara" nominācijas, no kurām balvu saņēma četrās kategorijās. Rigana lomas atveidotājs Maikls Kītons vienu no slavenākajām lomām atveidoja asa sižeta piedzīvojumu filmā "Betmens" (1989). Filmas režisors ir Meksikā dzimušais Alehandro Gonzalezs Injaritu, kurš pazīstams ar filmām "Mīla kuce" (2000), "21 grams" (2003), "Bābele" (2006) un "Biutiful" (2010). Injaritu filmas ir mākslinieciski augstvērtīgi un sarežģīti "juveliera darbi"; sadarbību ar režisoru slavējuši vairāki augstas raudzes Holivudas aktieri, tostarp Šons Pens, Naomi Votsa, Benisio del Toro, Breds Pits, Keita Blanšeta, Havjers Bardems.

programme.title: Nozust 60 sekundēs
programme.desc: Cik daudz var paveikt 60 sekundēs? Izsmēķēt cigareti vai izdzert tasīti kafijas. Taču tikai viens profesionālis pasaulē –leģendārais zaglis Memfiss – dažu sekunžu laikā spēj aizdzīt jebkuru automobili. Šoreiz gan viņam nāksies paveikt burtiski neiespējamo. Lai glābtu savu brāli, Memfisam vienas nakts laikā jānolaupa 50 pirmklasīgas mašīnas. Lai izkļūtu no mafijas un policijas dubultslazda, viņam jāievēro tikai viens princips - nedrīkst apstāties...

programme.title: Nevainīgā
programme.desc: Cecīlija, ārkārtīgi ticīga sieviete, tiek laipni uzņemta gleznainā Itālijas ainavā esošā klosterī. Taču Cecīlijai drīz vien kļūst skaidrs, ka viņas jaunās mājas slēpj tumšus un šausminošus noslēpumus.

programme.title: Vīriešu pārbaudes spēle basketbolā .. Grieķija - Latvija
Futbols: LaLiga. Celta - Getafe
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. programme.desc: Coverage from the ONE Championship; martial arts competitions which include mixed martial arts (MMA), Muay Thai, and kickboxing. Enjoy all the action with top-class competitors from across Asia and the world.

programme.desc: All the action and cutting edge stories directly from the Cincinnati Masters, also called the Western and Southern Open for sponsorship reasons, the annual outdoor hardcourt tennis event held in Mason near Cincinnati, Ohio.

programme.desc: Get the best moments of the Womens National Basketball Association, a professional basketball league in the United States. It currently is composed of twelve teams. The regular season is played from May to September, the All Star game is played midway through the season in July and the WNBA Finals at the end of September until the beginning of October.

programme.title: Futbols: Ligue 1. Nantes - PSG
programme.desc: PSG, AS Monaco, Marseille, Olympique Lyonnais and Lille... just to name a few. Ligue 1 is currently full of well-organised football teams and incredible European talent, who are a complement to the sport. As the highest professional division in France, it has established itself as one of the top five leagues on the continent. Lyon are the most successful team in regards to consecutive titles, whereas PSG and AS Monaco have managed to propel themselves to the highest achievements in the league, with calculated foreign investment. With the latter coming from a principality, Ligue 1 is another example of a domestic league that provides cross-border competition. From southern wine-growing regions such as Bordeaux, to the historically renowned capital of Paris, we cover the whole of France.

programme.title: Futbols: LaLiga. Valencia - Real Sociedad
programme.desc: La Liga (The Campeonato Nacional de Liga de Primera Division) is the mens top professional football division of the Spanish football league system. It is administered by the National Professional Football League and has 20 contestants, with the three lowest-placed teams at the end of each season relegated to the Segunda Division and replaced by the top two teams and a play-off winner in that division. Nine teams have become champions, Real Madrid has got the title 33 times and FC Barcelona 26 times. La Liga is one of the most popular professional sports leagues in the world and the top league in Europe over the last five years.

programme.title: Bundesliga. Bayern - Leipzig
programme.desc: Germany has the most attended football league in the world, in the Bundesliga. We bring these authentic fab experiences to your living room with all the key moments of the 2019-20 season, to ensure that your appetite for German football is well and truly met. The likes of Borussia Dortmund and Bayern Munich are met with stern competition this season, as RB Leipzig look to build on their third-placed finish from last season. This programme brings all the games of the german top-flight into one place, so that you can easily catch up with the weeks action. As we reach the business end-of-the-season, watch the victors and losers dictate the final table. With relegation spots and Champions League places yet to be decided, it promises to be a rather exciting conclusion for all those concerned.

Farmhouse Fixer
programme.desc: Singer Jonathan Knight demonstrates his renovation know-how skills. He has renovated more than 200 houses, while preserving their original craftsmanship. programme.title: Vintage Flip

programme.title: Vintage Flip

programme.title: Flipping 101 with Tarek El Moussa
programme.desc: Getting into property flipping can be daunting for first-timers, which is why Tarek El Moussa is on hand to share invaluable advice that will put them on course for handsome profits. With years in the industry, Tarek has seen and done it all. Now he wants to draw on some of his own experiences to ensure novice flippers dont make costly mistakes. Aided by Tareks knowledge and a few of his clients, surely nothing can go wrong? Reality series.

programme.title: Caribbean Life
programme.desc: The lure of the Caribbeans idyllic beaches, fabulous climate and laidback approach to life is too much for many mainland Americans to dismiss. Caribbean Life follows house-hunting couples and families as they seek to buy their own slice of paradise, in the form of a glorious home in an astonishingly beautiful location. With the help of real estate advisors they choose the properties that best suit their needs and budgets, before deciding if its time to leave the states and start anew. Paradise doesnt have to be expensive, as the prospective buyers soon realise.

programme.title: Caribbean Life

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home
programme.desc: This is a property hunting show with a very expensive twist. David Bromstad joins people as they search for their dream homes with a dreamy budget, thats because all of the guest on this particular house hunting show are lottery winners. Whether these lucky families are after a family home in the suburbs outside Boston with a yard big enough for a swing set and pool, or a classy but understated home in quiet and relaxed Bethany Beach, Delaware, property expert Bromstad is sure to find the perfect pad.

programme.title: My Lottery Dream Home

programme.title: Beachfront Bargain Hunt
programme.desc: Attempting to bring families dreams come to life, but on a budget, Beachfront Bargain Hunt shows that you dont have to be a millionaire if you want to live a life by the sea! Narrated by John Beach, this show follows a number of couples, families and people looking just for themselves exploring various beachfronts in USA, looking for homes that wont break the bank. Ensuring each person gets what they want, they are introduced to a number of properties that meet their ultimate dream home in the hopes that they will indeed find the one. With 101 episodes, Beachfront Bargain Hunt introduces you to the life that can be led, without breaking to bank, to live a life by the sea!

programme.title: House Hunters
programme.desc: American reality series following host Suzanne Whang on her quest to help people relocate in search of their dream home. Follow the individuals, couples and families in an international search for their perfect property, exploring a stunning selection of homes chosen just for them. With three potential candidates to choose from, join them as they try and make the difficult decision to start a new life abroad. Revisit the new homeowners at the end of each episode to see how their properties have developed and how life has changed for them since the move.

programme.title: House Hunters
