programme.title: Silk Railroad
programme.desc: Yiwu- the worlds largest small commodities market. In 2014, as part of Chinas Belt and Road Initiative, the city became home to a new freight train network to Europe. Today, it takes only 16 days to reach Madrid on the longest freight train route in the world as compared to over a year on the ancient silk road 2000 years ago. Historian Sam Willis teams up with journalist Li Qiuyuan to dig into Yiwus trading past and explore how this modern-day rail link is changing how China trades with the west.

programme.title: Silk Railroad
programme.desc: 2000 years ago, in the time of the ancient Silk Road, the journey between China, Central Asia and Europe often took an entire year. Today, goods can be transported overland in just 14 days thanks to the worlds longest rail service, a 13,000 KM route that connects China and Europe. Now, with ancient connections being revived for the 21st century, historian Sam Willis and journalist Li Qiuyuan travel to Chengdu, to explore how a new era of trade is shaping the city.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: On January 15, 2009, US Airways Flight 1549 took off from New York Citys LaGuardia Airport and collided with a flock of birds, causing both engines to fail. Captain Chesley "Sully" Sullenberger and co-pilot Jeffrey Skyles successfully performed an emergency landing in the Hudson River, saving all 155 people on board. Survivors of the "Miracle on the Hudson" share their experiences.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: Pakistan International Airlines Flight 8303 was near the end of a 90-minute journey from Lahore to Karachi when it dramatically crashed on 22 May 2020. While attempting a second approach after a failed landing, the Airbus A320 tragically crashed in a densely populated residential area only a few kilometers from the runway. In this episode, we hear from one of only two survivors.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: On 17 January 2008, British Airways Flight 38 was approaching London Heathrow Airport when it crashed just short of the runway. The uneventful passenger flight from Beijing, China turned almost fatal when a lack of power to both engines caused the Boeing 777 to crash. Quick thinking by the crew and Captain Peter Burkill prevented the incident from being fatal and saved all 152 people on board.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: This series will go back through the record to explore life-altering, earth-shattering, unforgettable events using a combination of carefully selected archive, cutting edge CGI and informative scripting in this popular science format. As well as exploring spectacular archive, illustrating the full toll these disasters can take, well dig into the science behind each event, shining a light on the most fascinating elements and giving an understanding on how and why these events occur.

programme.title: Destruction Decoded
programme.desc: This series will go back through the record to explore life-altering, earth-shattering, unforgettable events using a combination of carefully selected archive, cutting edge CGI and informative scripting in this popular science format. As well as exploring spectacular archive, illustrating the full toll these disasters can take, well dig into the science behind each event, shining a light on the most fascinating elements and giving an understanding on how and why these events occur.

programme.title: Disaster Autopsy
programme.desc: Three real world disasters forensically analysed and recreated in astonishing detail from expert analysis and all the evidence. Why did the Surfside condo block in Miami collapse on its sleeping residents? What caused the lethal fire in Kings Cross subway station when it was packed with commuters? Why did Russias Kursk nuclear submarine sink without warning?

programme.title: Construction Fails
programme.desc: We begin in New Orleans where construction turned to destruction during the build of a brand new Hard Rock Hotel. The catastrophe left two cranes precariously dangling from the structure. The dismantling of the cranes is one of the most dramatic events we witness. The Big Dig in Boston was Americas most expensive infrastructure project ever. Delays and cost over-runs are legendary, but the collapse of the tunnels ceiling is an infamous example of how just a few extra dollars spent on the correct adhesive could have prevented a tragedy.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Supercar Megabuild
programme.desc: Car builders Dan Baruffo and Shane Lynch are challenged to design and build a motorbike that can seamlessly match the style and performance of one of the fastest and most exclusive hypercars on the planet - a #2,000,000 McLaren P1. With no bike building experience, the pair must quickly learn how to create a truly special machine if theyre to impress the boss and encourage one of his customers part with an eye-watering amount of money.

programme.title: Supercar Megabuild
programme.desc: Returning for an epic second series, expert mechanics Shane and Dan take supercars and engineer them to the max! This series will see Maseratis going 200 mile an hour in Le Mans, an Audi R8 enter the Gymkhana Grid, and a Porsche turned into an ice-rally roadster. Alongside there will be Bentleys in the desert, Jaguars racing Spitfires and even an off-roading transporter carrying a Lamborghini. SuperCar MegaBuild: Even perfection can be perfected!

programme.title: Megacities
programme.desc: Its the second largest city on earth - and the most important city in Brazil. More than 10 million people live in Sao Paulo. But fitting people isnt a problem. The challenge is the citys trash. Every day, Sao Paulo generates 14,000 tons of garbage -- the weight of the leaning Tower of Pisa. Sao Paulo has embarked on a green revolution by harnessing hectares of trash to produce energy. Aluminum cans are the most recycled object on earth, and Brazil leads the way when it comes not only to recycling them, but the speed at which its done. This episode follows one aluminum can from the time it is picked by one of the catadores - the trash-pickers of Sao Paulo who make their living from collecting recyclables - through pressing, melting, and re-melting, to the moment it is ready to become a new can. State of the art technology combined with typical Brazilian ingenuity contributes not only to a clean environment, but to help poor citizens earn their living.

programme.title: Megacities
programme.desc: The City of Lights. The worlds capital of art, romance, and - mais oui - food. Each day, the worlds richest cuisine goes into more than two million mouths. And what goes in, must come out. A single flush begins an epic journey from the Jules Verne Restaurant at the top of the Eiffel Tower: a fantastic voyage from noxious waste to potable beverage, a voyage spanning time and technology through the fabled sewers of Paris.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Extreme weather patterns have threatened ships and mariners for centuries. The perfect storm?. towering walls of water, powerful winds and churning seas can overwhelm any ship. What brought down the largest haul of Spanish treasure off the coast of Florida? And whats the truth behind the strange disappearance of the mightiest invasion force of ancient times? Drain the Oceans reveals the secrets of Stormy Seas.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: Historic texts tell of a mighty Ancient Egyptian city in the Nile delta. Celebrated as a trade hub and visited by Greek gods it mysteriously disappears from history in the 2nd century BC. After 2000 years existing only in legend we drain away the waters of the Mediterranean to reveal this metropolis in all its former glory. Using cutting edge technology and archeological data to finally unravel the mystery behind its extraordinary rise to international fame and the terrifying events that led to its destruction.

programme.title: Drain the Oceans
programme.desc: In lakes and rivers of the modern United States, teams of explorers are discovering forgotten shipwrecks from the American Revolution. By combing their data with cutting-edge computer-graphics the water is drained away to reveal them to light of the day after 240 years at the bottom. The modern investigation into the wrecks details reveals startling new evidence about a nations against-all-odds battle for independence.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Even during a pandemic, smuggling never stops. After adjusting tactics in the early days of the COVID crisis to meet the increasing flow of narcotics coming across our southern land borders, the Department of Homeland Security is now pivoting back to our nations airports where international travel is starting to rev back up again. Whether narco-traffickers try to slip through an airport, seaport or land crossing, vigilant officers are on high-alert to stem the flow of illegal contraband. Using every tool available to them, DHS will stop at nothing to catch a smuggler.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Even during a pandemic, smuggling never stops. After adjusting tactics in the early days of the COVID crisis to meet the increasing flow of narcotics coming across our southern land borders, the Department of Homeland Security is now pivoting back to our nations airports where international travel is starting to rev back up again. Whether narco-traffickers try to slip through an airport, seaport or land crossing, vigilant officers are on high-alert to stem the flow of illegal contraband. Using every tool available to them, DHS will stop at nothing to catch a smuggler.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: CBP Officers on the Southern Border discover two loads of lethal fentanyl concealed within cars - 7.66 kilos that are magnetized to the underside of a vehicle, and 4.06 kilos that are hidden within a cars air filter. Amidst a tightening of Covid-19 immigration restrictions, CBP at Newark Seaport searches for an illegal stowaway onboard a container ship. And CBP at Newark Airport discovers ecstasy and ketamine concealed within express shipments.

programme.title: Trafficked with Mariana van Zeller
programme.desc: Mariana hears rumors that young women from Vietnam are being kidnapped and trafficked into China to be sold as unwilling brides. This begins a journey unlike any shes been on, as shes forced to navigate government minders, geopolitical tensions and shadowy criminal networks in a search for the truth. What she finds, with the help of a local reporter, is more shocking than she even imagined.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: Pakistan International Airlines Flight 8303 was near the end of a 90-minute journey from Lahore to Karachi when it dramatically crashed on 22 May 2020. While attempting a second approach after a failed landing, the Airbus A320 tragically crashed in a densely populated residential area only a few kilometers from the runway. In this episode, we hear from one of only two survivors.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: TAM Airlines Flight #3054 Airbus A320 July 17th, 2007 - TAM Airlines Flight #3054 is on its final approach to Sao Paulos notorious Congonhas Airport. Runway 35-L at Congonhas is one of the most treacherous in the world. Its built on a hilltop, surrounded by tall buildings. The crew of Flight #3054 gets a report that the runway is wet and slippery. Captain Henrique Stephanini brings his Airbus A-320 down at the foot of the 1,945 meter long runway, activates the one working thrust reverser and applies the brakes, but his plane doesnt slow down. It hurtles down the runway at top speed, crosses a highway and slams into a building and adjacent gas station. No one on the plane survives. 12 people on the ground are also killed. This is the worst aviation disaster in South American history. Investigators are under enormous pressure to figure out what went wrong on one of Brazils busiest runways, before it claims any more lives.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: United Airlines Flight #232 DC-10 July 19th, 1989 United Airlines Flight #232 is 37,000 feet over Iowa when one of its three engines explodes. The pilots shut it down but soon discover they have a much more serious problem on their hands. The plane is in a steep right bank, and the pilots are unable to restore its flight path. The DC-10 has suffered a complete failure of all hydraulic systems, and the pilots have no way to maneuver the plane other than by alternating the power to the two remaining engines. The pilots manage to fly the crippled plane to the nearest airport but, unable to configure the wings for a normal landing, they have no choice but to keep the engines at nearly full power. After a crash that claims 111 of the 296 people on board, its up to investigators to figure out how a foolproof system failed.

programme.title: Mysterious Islands
programme.desc: Ruins excavated on Pitcairn Island shed light on a previously unknown civilization. In the jungle of Borneo, researchers discover a strange green light in the pitch-dark forest. The remains of a long-lost temple are found decaying on the Greek island of Euboea. Coral rubble unearthed on Sudans Suakin Island unveils the vibrant past of a marine trade center in the Red Sea.

programme.title: Mysterious Islands
programme.desc: Coastal erosion exposes skeletal remains, revealing the haunting past of Medieval floating prisons. A special type of spider is discovered on an isolated island. Archaeologists uncover evidence that could point to the fate of the lost Roanoke settlers. Thousands of dead seals are found with strange corkscrew wounds in Canada, confounding experts.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: Even during a pandemic, smuggling never stops. After adjusting tactics in the early days of the COVID crisis to meet the increasing flow of narcotics coming across our southern land borders, the Department of Homeland Security is now pivoting back to our nations airports where international travel is starting to rev back up again. Whether narco-traffickers try to slip through an airport, seaport or land crossing, vigilant officers are on high-alert to stem the flow of illegal contraband. Using every tool available to them, DHS will stop at nothing to catch a smuggler.

programme.title: Trafficked with Mariana van Zeller
programme.desc: Mariana hears rumors that young women from Vietnam are being kidnapped and trafficked into China to be sold as unwilling brides. This begins a journey unlike any shes been on, as shes forced to navigate government minders, geopolitical tensions and shadowy criminal networks in a search for the truth. What she finds, with the help of a local reporter, is more shocking than she even imagined.

programme.title: Trafficked with Mariana van Zeller
programme.desc: Mariana investigates the global phenomenon of armored car heists, responsible for some of the most brazen and dangerous robberies in the world. In Los Angeles and in Johannesburg, shell meet crews, learn how they plan their attacks, and go behind the scenes to understand the ever-expanding arms race between these criminals and the private security companies trying to stop them.

programme.title: Historys Secrets
programme.desc: Most historians have reached a consensus about the way major world events played out. Yet decades after the fact, certain stories remain touched by an air of uncertainty. Join NGT as we investigate the truth behind some of historys greatest events.

programme.title: Historys Secrets
programme.desc: Its one of the worlds most notorious unsolved skyjackings and missing person cases…and new evidence is leading the FBI to reopen their files with the belief it might finally be solved. The night before Thanksgiving, 1971, a man by the name of Dan Cooper boarded Northwest Orient Airlines flight 305 from Portland to Seattle. Several hours later, with $200,000 strapped to his body, he leapt from the plane - and into history. A reporter botched the name of the culprit, and D.B. Cooper was born. A collection of suspects and clues have emerged - a copycat crime, a bag full of Coopers bills discovered in 1980, a deathbed confessional - but all leads have proven inconclusive. But the past year or so has seen a flurry of new clues. In 2007, new evidence emerged from a man who claims that his deceased brother - a Northwest employee and Army paratrooper - was the real D.B. Cooper. Then, in March 2008, a parachute turned up on a field where Cooper could have landed that matched the one he used. Meanwhile, new evidence released by the FBI in the past few months is generating new theories - and suspects. As the FBI reopens the case, well follow the same evidence trail to find out if this new information could finally bring this notorious case to a close.

programme.title: To Catch a Smuggler
programme.desc: HSI agents in Miami discover a shipment of fish found to contain 37 kilos of cocaine worth almost 2 million dollars. Meanwhile, San Diego CBP officers disrupt multiple human smuggling attempts at the San Ysidro border involving 8 individuals in 3 different vehicles. And CBP agriculture specialists in Atlanta search passengers to stop the spread of destructive invasive species stemming from prohibited food items.

programme.title: Science of Stupid
programme.desc: Science of Stupid, series 8. Dallas Campbell hosts the show that combines serious science with some of the craziest, most spectacular user generated clips ever recorded. In each programme we show 40 to 50 clips of misadventure: ordinary folk making extraordinary mistakes and paying the price. We analyse the science behind the mishaps, with the help of bespoke animation and super slow-motion cinematography.

programme.title: Europe from Above
programme.desc: A fascinating documentary series from National Geographic exploring Europe from above. Although only the second-smallest continent on our planet, Europe is packed full of diverse wildlife, cities, countries, politics and history. From this unique perspective, viewers can see the culturally rich continent like they never have before, with cameras in the sky offering a stunning examination of these beautiful lands. Each episode in this six-part series focusses on a respective country, with those explored in this series being the Netherlands, Italy, Germany, Spain, the United Kingdom and Poland. Narrated by Julian Barratt.

programme.title: Europe from Above
programme.desc: A fascinating documentary series from National Geographic exploring Europe from above. programme.title: Superstructures: Engineering Marvels
programme.desc: This brand new series reveals the extraordinary feats of engineering hidden inside the worlds most spectacular man-made constructions. From the worlds biggest plane and largest free-spanning dome to the tallest building and the largest space ship, each superstructure is taken apart using state-of-the-art CGI and insight from world class specialists to reveal the startling innovations that turn it from dream to reality.

programme.title: Superstructures: Engineering Marvels

programme.title: Northwoods Survival
programme.desc: Margot takes advantage of the milder Yukon weather and tries her hand at a few new wilderness DIY projects; In the hopes of making his life in the bush "easier" - Matty digs deep - and searches for a less labor-intensive source of water. To accommodate the arrival of a few "four-legged" friends, Billy works on upgrading his backwoods property; And Emilie and Gilbert head into the wilds of Ontario - on the hunt for a source of spring-time sustenance.

programme.title: Northwoods Survival
programme.desc: Facing a spate of thunderstorms, Margot makes one final, all out push to complete her Yukon dream home. Billy builds a backwoods BBQ - the last step in his goal to turn his simple abode into the perfect wilderness homestead. With summer right around the corner, Matty takes steps to "up" his waterfront "game". And Emilie and Gilbert battle late season snows as they rush to complete their backcountry cabin before some very special guests arrive.

programme.title: Lawless Island
programme.desc: The volatile climate of Southeast Alaska challenges Port Protections residents who live on the edge of society. Gary battles father time while securing needed resources. Curly pushes through in the wake of a tragic loss. Mary faces her fears to survive in extreme conditions. Sam fights to preserve the only lifestyle hes ever known. Squibb looks to improve upon his surroundings. And Stuart deals with past injuries as he battles the elements.

programme.title: Lawless Island
programme.desc: The volatile climate of Southeast Alaska challenges Port Protections residents who live on the edge of society. Gary battles father time while securing needed resources. programme.title: Ice Road Rescue
programme.desc: In "Ice Road Rescue" we follow a group of heroic and tough men who challenges the rought winter conditions in Norway by rescuing heavy trailers passing through the norwegian mountain terrain. We follow our main charachters, the heroic rescue workers, in both the southern and norhern mountains of norway. With extreme tought winter conditions that often results in in dangerous rescues, our men always come to the rescue. This is man vs nature and no rescue is too small for our rescue workers.

programme.title: Plane Crash Recreated
programme.desc: On July 19, 1989, United Airlines Flight 232 departed from Denver to Chicago when the DC-10 aircraft suffered a catastrophic failure. The crew onboard faced the impossible task of landing with a total loss of control. 112 passengers perished in the horrific crash and 184 people survived. Survivors, give a first-hand account of what could have been their final moments.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Continental Express Flight #2574 Embraer 120 Brasilia On its second routine trip of the morning, Continental Express Flight #2574 is nearing the end of its one-hour flight from Laredo to Houston, Texas. A state-of-the-art Embraer 120 Brasilia, the commuter plane is scheduled to make several more short flights. But just as the pilots are preparing for descent, the plane falls out of the sky. Dropping thousands of feet in mere seconds, there is a massive explosion as the aircraft crashes into a farmers field. All 14 people on board die in the disaster, and the impact is so violent that the wreckage is barely recognizable as an airplane. Investigators consider that there was a bomb on board, but when the theory is dismissed, they dig deeper and eventually reveal a chilling story of good intentions gone horribly wrong.

programme.title: Air Crash Investigation
programme.desc: Northwest Airlines Flight #85 Boeing 747-400 Northwest Airlines Flight #85 is halfway between Detroit and Japans Narita Airport. With more than 400 people on board, the Boeing 747 is cruising 35,000 feet above the Bering Sea when suddenly the aircraft lurches violently to the left and begins losing altitude. The pilots manage to level out the plane but have difficulty controlling the crippled and shaking aircraft. After declaring an emergency, they turn around in the hopes of reaching Anchorage, 1300 kilometers away. Nearly two hours later, the terrifying ordeal ends when the plane touches down safely. The skilled pilots have narrowly saved a 747 from a fatal crash. Now its up to investigators to determine what caused them to lose control of the plane in the first place.

programme.title: Europe from Above
programme.desc: A fascinating documentary series from National Geographic exploring Europe from above. programme.title: Silk Railroad
programme.desc: Yiwu- the worlds largest small commodities market. In 2014, as part of Chinas Belt and Road Initiative, the city became home to a new freight train network to Europe. Today, it takes only 16 days to reach Madrid on the longest freight train route in the world as compared to over a year on the ancient silk road 2000 years ago. Historian Sam Willis teams up with journalist Li Qiuyuan to dig into Yiwus trading past and explore how this modern-day rail link is changing how China trades with the west.

programme.title: Silk Railroad
programme.desc: 2000 years ago, in the time of the ancient Silk Road, the journey between China, Central Asia and Europe often took an entire year. Today, goods can be transported overland in just 14 days thanks to the worlds longest rail service, a 13,000 KM route that connects China and Europe. Now, with ancient connections being revived for the 21st century, historian Sam Willis and journalist Li Qiuyuan travel to Chengdu, to explore how a new era of trade is shaping the city.

programme.title: Americas Wild Spaces
programme.desc: This show explores the unbridled natural beauty of Americas national parks and highlights some of the most awe-inspiring scenery on the planet. Travelling beyond the more conventional tourist hot-spots, the viewer is transported to the hidden wonders of Americas wild spaces. Episodes include joining a scientific exploration of the 277 mile long Grand Canyon, studying its geological history, exploring the microscopic colonies of vegetation and examining its unique creatures; journeying through the Everglades, a 1.5 million acre home to strange creatures, carnivorous plants, amphibious birds and fish that can breathe air; and navigating across the northwest archipelago of Hawaii following a team of diving scientists as they inspect the unique aquaeous flora and fauna.

programme.title: Queens
programme.desc: The African Savanna is home to the ultimate animal sisterhood; a family of elephants. A new baby will need the familys support to make it through her early vulnerable months. While mom learns how to care for her, it is the babys grandmother, the matriarch, that must protect her. Facing predators, drought and a rapidly changing world can this new baby and her family of iconic females survive?

programme.title: Animals Gone Wild
programme.desc: How outrageous can the animal kingdom get? Whether its out-of-bounds behavior or savage instincts run amok, when animals act out, theyre a force to be reckoned with. From the mysterious depths of the deep blue sea to the jungles untamed edge, see just how rough, rowdy, and lawless Mother Natures most unruly creatures can be.

programme.title: Animals Gone Wild
programme.desc: When your numbers up, its up. Or is it? When fight or flight instincts kick in, anything is possible, and animals will do anything to survive. From heroic acts of bravery to narrow escapes and near misses, expect the unexpected when creatures big and small encounter the animal kingdoms strangest curve balls in Animals Gone Wild: Shock and Awe.

programme.title: Animals Gone Wild
programme.desc: From the deepest seas to the tallest mountains, animals continuously surprise us and prove yet again that when it comes to Mother Nature, there is always an exception to the rule. These animals go against the grain, whether cheating death or forming odd friendships- its Animals Gone Wild: Surprisingly Human.

programme.title: Queens
programme.desc: The coastal realm of land and sea is home to two of natures most iconic females - orca and grizzly bears. Under the waves in the Gulf of California, the orca familys success relies on the experience of their sixty-year-old matriarch; while on the beaches of Alaska, a first-time bear mother must raise her three cubs alone and with only her instincts to guide her.

programme.title: Animals Gone Wild
programme.desc: How outrageous can the animal kingdom get? Whether its out-of-bounds behavior or savage instincts run amok, when animals act out, theyre a force to be reckoned with. From the mysterious depths of the deep blue sea to the jungles untamed edge, see just how rough, rowdy, and lawless Mother Natures most unruly creatures can be.

programme.title: Animals Gone Wild

From heroic acts of bravery to narrow escapes and near misses, expect the unexpected when creatures big and small encounter the animal kingdoms strangest curve balls in Animals Gone Wild: Shock and Awe.

programme.title: Trials of the Wild
programme.desc: Watch a range of wild animals trying to survive in the wilderness as they migrate, hunt and defend themselves against predators and the dangers that are living alongside them. Follow animals born to fight to those designed to live in the canopy of trees as the series gives you an insight into natures greatest spectacles from around the world on land, water and air. This nature documentary is intriguing and engaging as they examine a range of species and how they survive in the most brutal environments.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin ventures into Australias notorious wetlands to discover three animals built for the muggy and wet environment. Phil comes face to face with the uniquely Australian freshwater crocodile, a massive predatory fish called the barramundi, and the saltwater crocodile, one of the worlds most dangerous animals and largest reptiles.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin heads along the cliffs and sandy flats of the Australian coast to discover which animal dominates the shoreline. His first encounter is with a white -bellied sea eagle, a bird with extremely sharp talons, followed by the estuarine stonefish, the most venomous fish in the world. Finally, Phil takes a closer look at the notorious stingray.

programme.title: Dr Oakley: Yukon Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Michelle Oakley and her adventures around her home base of Haines Junction, Yukon and Haines, Alaska. Dr. Oakley is a full-time vet, devoted Mom of three daughters and a wife. Join her every day routine as she helps all kinds of animals and birds- wild and domestic, big and small in a far away part of the world, very often in super remote areas. Dr. Oakley is doing her duty in very tough conditions, but she is doing it brilliantly, with all her heart.

programme.title: Trials of the Wild

programme.title: Trials of the Wild
programme.desc: Watch a range of wild animals trying to survive in the wilderness as they migrate, hunt and defend themselves against predators and the dangers that are living alongside them. Follow animals born to fight to those designed to live in the canopy of trees as the series gives you an insight into natures greatest spectacles from around the world on land, water and air. This nature documentary is intriguing and engaging as they examine a range of species and how they survive in the most brutal environments.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: In the wild, animals face life or death battles every day, from escaping deadly predators to fighting off fierce rivals. Sometimes brute force isnt enough to prevail. Survival can depend on death-defying acrobatics, secret senses and hidden weapons - the extraordinary superpowers that help animals survive.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how lions hunt large prey like buffalo and zebra, offering new perspectives on the way these predators stalk, chase and kill. A lone lioness relies on cunning to feed her newborn cubs, whilst a fearless pride tries to take down the biggest prey of all, a giant African elephant.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: In the wild, animals face life or death battles every day, from escaping deadly predators to fighting off fierce rivals. Sometimes brute force isnt enough to prevail. Survival can depend on death-defying acrobatics, secret senses and hidden weapons - the extraordinary superpowers that help animals survive.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: The battle between predator and prey is not always about power and strength. Knowing what lurks in the dark can mean the difference between life and death. Extraordinary powers that penetrate darkness give some creatures the edge, and the chance to live another day.

programme.title: Wild, Smart and Deadly
programme.desc: To win the game of life, it can take more than brute force. Animals with a super-powered sixth sense can get the edge on fast-moving prey, beat the elements, and find food in unlikely places.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how lions hunt large prey like buffalo and zebra, offering new perspectives on the way these predators stalk, chase and kill. A lone lioness relies on cunning to feed her newborn cubs, whilst a fearless pride tries to take down the biggest prey of all, a giant African elephant.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how cheetahs hunt their prey, offering new perspectives on the tactics employed by these expert predators when stalking, chasing and bringing down antelope and wildebeest. Following a young cheetah mother over 18-months as she teaches her three cubs the secrets of the hunt.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how Nile crocodiles hunt, offering new perspectives on the patient and precise tactics they use when ambushing migratory herds of wildebeest and zebra that pass through their territories. A male crocodile must target large prey in a bid to survive the harshest time of the year.

programme.title: Predator v Prey
programme.desc: A forensic look at how leopards hunt prey both large and small, offering a new perspective on the way these silent killers stalk and ambush everything from impala to wildebeest and catfish to storks. A female leopard deploys stealth, strength and agility to take down prey on land, in water and from the air.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol Compilations
programme.desc: Theres not much that Dr. Jan Pol hasnt seen throughout his long, veterinarian career. The Dutch-born veterinarian has been helping animals since he graduated from Utrecht University in 1970. In this series we look back at memorable moments from his reality series, The Incredible Dr. Pol, where alongside his employees and his family he helps nurse a variety of creatures back to health from his Michigan-based practice. His clients come in all shapes and sizes, often needing urgent medical assistance, something that Dr. Jan Pol lives for. The passionate veterinarian is always keen to help, and we revisit the original series greatest moments.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Reality show follows Dutch-born veterinarian Jan Pol, his family and employees everyday. Jan Pol and his wife Diane started their own practice in Weidman, Michigan, Pol Veterinary Services, back in in 1981. Dr Pol takes a good care of every family pet and head of livestock no matter what size or condition and is a true legend in the community. Dr Pol has seen it all, treating numerous patients every single day, his daily routine is more than 12 hours but nothing can stop him from being devoted to his patients.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin heads along the cliffs and sandy flats of the Australian coast to discover which animal dominates the shoreline. His first encounter is with a white -bellied sea eagle, a bird with extremely sharp talons, followed by the estuarine stonefish, the most venomous fish in the world. Finally, Phil takes a closer look at the notorious stingray.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Indigenous educator Phil Breslin heads into the mangroves to discover which animal is truly built to survive the mud and muck. He encounters a feisty mud crab with huge pincers and catches a shovel-nosed ray with his bare hands. Finally, Phil faces a creature we all love to hate—the mosquito—and discovers theres more to these tiny bloodsuckers than meets the eye.

programme.title: Built to Survive
programme.desc: Within the Channel Country deserts, Indigenous educator Phil Breslin scours the endless sands to find three animals that not only survive the heat but thrive in unrelenting conditions. Get ready to meet Australias most impressive animals: the perentie, the continents largest lizard; the emu, its fastest flightless bird; and the mighty red kangaroo, the worlds largest marsupial.

programme.title: Predator v Prey

programme.title: Underdogs
programme.desc: Forget the birds and the bees, Ryan reveals the steps to finding "the one," underdog style. programme.title: NBA. Oklahomasitijas "Thunder" - Indiānas "Pacers"
programme.desc: The National Basketball Association composes of thirty teams across North America for men who are professional in this specific sport. Due to its popularity, this is one of four major professional sport leagues available in the United States of America and Canada. Legends of this particular sport include Kobe Bryant, Michael Jordan and Kareem Abdul-Jabbar.

programme.title: NBA Special
programme.desc: Get the highlights of the untold stories of Scottish basketball. A look back on the fierce rivalry between Edinburgh and Falkirk that started a golden era for the sport in the 1980s, and the success of the national team at the 2018 Commonwealth Games.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Maksam ir netipisks mīlulis - Haizivsuns, pa pusei haizivs, pa pusei suns. Sākumā Makss cenšas paturēt Haizivsuni noslēpumā, bet Fogijspringsā mīt viņa draugi, ziņkārīgi kaimiņi un pat Maksa vecāki tomēr pamanīs Maksa jauno labāko draugu.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Ienirstiet Haizivs Mazuļa, viņa ģimenes un draugu sālsūdens pasaulē.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Mamma parāda spējas, kas pārsteidz Mazuli, liekot viņam apgūt tādu pašu superspēju - sevis nomierināšanu.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons savaino celi un dodas pie Dr. Jasmīnas. Kad viņa iziet, viņš tiek sajaukts ar ārstu. Vai Brauna kunga pidžamu ballīte atbildīs Brauna kundzes standartiem, kad Simi un Toka paliks pa nakti?

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Padingtons palīdz izperēt olu, bet ir jāgaida ļoti ilgi. Kad tā beidzot izšķiļas, viņš tiek pie pārsteiguma! Padingtons vēlas, kaut varētu piedalīties Braunu kāzās, apskatot fotogrāfijas, un viņi nolemj to visu atkārtot!

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Briežu komanda
programme.desc: Mūsu varoņi ir atpakaļ, un šoreiz Briežu komanda pametīs šīs pasaules robežas! Gatavojies varonīgai planētas glābšanai ar dažādiem uzlabojumiem, jauniem tēliem, foršām lietām un satriecošiem piedzīvojumiem kosmosā!

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabērni domā, ka ēdiens spēj likt tiem mainīt krāsu un formu, tāpēc izlemj atrast katram piemēroto ēdienu. Barbabo nav iedvesmas, tāpēc vairs nespēj radīt. Visa ģimene palīdz, iesakot jaunas zīmējumu tēmas.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Mazā Šefpavāriņa šovs
programme.desc: Olija gatavo vienkāršu kūku dinoklubiņam, bet Šefpavāriņš grib sarežģīt recepti. Šefpavāriņš un Olija gatavo pelmeņus, taču, kad iesācējai Olijai tas padodas labāk, Šefpavāriņam jāatgūst pārliecinātība par savām locīšanas prasmēm.

programme.title: Briežu komanda
programme.desc: Briežu komanda atgriezusies ar jauniem, neticamiem piedzīvojumiem un varonīgām glābšanas misijām. Trešajā sezonā drosmīgā komanda uzzina vairāk par brīnišķīgo visumu, atklāj neticamo Mirdzumu salu un izpēta Mirdzumu jūras dzelmi.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs palīdz vecvecākiem iztīrīt bēniņus, bet ir grūti izlemt, ko mest ārā. Starp vecajām mantām Pepa atrod atskaņotāju un senus ierakstus.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa ar draugiem dodas pārgājienā kopā ar Gazeles jaunkundzi. Kad satumst, viņi visi dzied pie ugunskura. Kad laiks iet gulēt, Pepa ar draugiem ir nobijušies, un visi bērni dodas gulēt Gazeles jaunkundzes teltī.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepas un Džordža rotaļlietu grozs ir pilns, un viņu gultas noklātas ar mantām. Mamma pasūta jaunu rotaļlietu plauktu, bet tas jāsaliek. Mammai un tētim tas nepadodas.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš satiek vientuļniekvēzīti Šelliju, kura pazaudējusi savu čaulu un paslēpjas Zābaciņa zābakā. Dora dodas meklēt Šellijas mitekli. Tētis rīko kesadilju pikniku, bet ir aizmirsis mājās visas sastāvdaļas! Dora apņemas tās aizgādāt.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pastaigas laikā Barbapapas atrod megalītu. Barbagudrajam uznāk ģēnija cienīga iedvesma un viņš izgudro "Bam".

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabella lepni ģimenei paziņo, ka nolēmusi kļūt par princesi. Barbabravo nīkst no garlaicības, jo brāļi un māsas ir aizņemti un negrib ar viņu spēlēties.

programme.title: Ķepaiņu lietas
programme.desc: Antropomorfisku dzīvnieku pasaulē Sems Snovs un Kita Keisija ir elitāri KLEID (Slepenā dzīvnieku detektīvu ekspertu līga) aģenti, kas apceļo pasauli un risina noslēpumus, liekot lietā problēmu risināšanas un dzīvnieku faktu pārzināšanas prasmes.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Celtnieklīci ir pārņēmis noslēpums. Kad pēkšņi pazūd pilsētnieku skulptūra, Rabla komandai pievienojas Čeiss, lai atrisinātu pazudušās statujas noslēpumu... un uzbūvētu gluži jaunu Zinātnes centru, lai palīdzētu izmeklēt.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: DORA atgriežas ar jauniem fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem burvju lietusmežā. Pievienojies mazajai drosminiecei un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam jaunu draugu un jaunu prieku meklējumos. Lets go!

programme.title: Haizivs Mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Pārdrošais Haizivs Mazulis pārbauda no mammas un tēta iegūtās iemaņas savā pagalmā, kas, starp citu, ir okeāns.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Mazulis un Viljams pieskata rifa trusēnu un saprot, cik grūti ir būt vecākam.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pasaules krāsainākās ģimenes atgriešanās! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Barbapapu dzīvē nav rutīnas. Katra diena ir pārsteigumu un piedzīvojumu pilna!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbabo, Barbabella un Barbagudrais uzbūvē māju kokā. Barbamamma ir apņēmusies novērst piesārņojumu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Pilsētas palīgu gājiena dienā Ātrmeistars sabojā ceļu. Suņukiem ar steigu jālabo viņa kaitējums.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.title: Briežu komanda
programme.desc: Tērauds raizējas, ka Lolas debesu māksla ietekmē viņa cepuru stenda popularitāti, tāpēc viņš izjauc viņas darbus. Briežu komanda sacenšas, lai redzētu, kura auto ir ātrāks, bet Tērauds negaidīti pievienojas.

programme.desc: Rabls un suņi mēģina uzbūvēt lielu riteņu veikalu līdz Riteņu Festivālam... varbūt Ātrmeistars viņus apsteigs! Kad Motore atsakās iet vannā pirms ģimenes fotografēšanās, Rablam un suņiem jāatrod risinājums.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora un Zābaciņš savā minikārā sacenšas ar Krokšiem Lietusmeža rallijā. Dora un Zābaciņš piegādā Lielā Sarkanā Cāļa draugiem ielūgumus uz viņa dzimšanas dienas ballīti.

programme.title: Mazā Šefpavāriņa šovs
programme.desc: Pasaulē mazākajā kulinārijas šovā pasaulē mazākais šefpavārs gatavo pasaulē mazākos ēdienus.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Braucot ar riteņiem Barbapapu ģimene atrod viduslaiku pils drupas.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Jaunais Fransuā pieredz Barbapapas dzimšanu. Barbatēti iesloga zoodārzā.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Kad Zivtiņkomandai trāpa Vigo Spēju zagšanas stars, visi savstarpēji apmainās ar superspējām.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Ienirsti okeāna priekos kopā ar Haizivs Mazuli, viņa ģimeni un draugiem.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora atgriežas ar jauniem, fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem maģiskajā lietus mežā! Pievienojies visīpašākajam bērnam - pētniekam un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam, kad viņi satiek jaunus draugus! Nekas nav neiespējams! Aiziet!

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Maksam ir netipisks mīlulis - Haizivsuns, pa pusei haizivs, pa pusei suns. Sākumā Makss cenšas paturēt Haizivsuni noslēpumā, bet Fogijspringsā mīt viņa draugi, ziņkārīgi kaimiņi un pat Maksa vecāki tomēr pamanīs Maksa jauno labāko draugu.

programme.title: Haizivsuns
programme.desc: Maksam ir netipisks mīlulis - Haizivsuns, pa pusei haizivs, pa pusei suns. Sākumā Makss cenšas paturēt Haizivsuni noslēpumā, bet Fogijspringsā mīt viņa draugi, ziņkārīgi kaimiņi un pat Maksa vecāki tomēr pamanīs Maksa jauno labāko draugu.

programme.title: Haizivsuns

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Ienirstiet Haizivs Mazuļa, viņa ģimenes un draugu sālsūdens pasaulē.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Mazulis aizraujas, palīdzot vecvecākiem plānot zvērestu atjaunošanas ceremoniju.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Karija kungs grib kļūt par līderi un izveidot dabas klubu, lai atstātu iespaidu uz Potsa kundzi. Vai viņa fakti ir pareizi? Padingtons nokrīt un zaudē savu rāpšanās pašapziņu. Bez rāpšanās viņš nejūtas kā savā ādā - ko viņš var darīt?

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Džonatans ar Padingtonu ezerā atrod dārgumu karti! Arī Džūdija un Toks tādu atrod. Kuri atradīs dārgumus pirmie? Grūbera kungs vienmēr gribējis doties uz Itāliju, Padingtons apņēmies palīdzēt piepildīt drauga sapni.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls ar komandu pārvācas uz Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas vien nepieciešams.

programme.title: Briežu komanda
programme.desc: Profesora Skrambas ierīce rada haosu, kad Tērauds to izmanto, lai iegūtu briežu spējas. Ramijam jāiemācās uzticēties draugiem, kad viņš nolemj rūpēties par pamestu olu, vienlaikus gādājot par skudru invāziju.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Vola, Goldija, Čaks un Henks jūtas atstumti, kad uzzina, ka Bārba un Viljams glabā super noslēpumu. Lai sagatavotos savai pirmajai lielajai televīzijas intervijai, Haizivju spēks trenējas būt līdzīgi saviem iemīļotajiem komiksu varoņiem.

programme.title: Haizivs mazuļa lielais šovs
programme.desc: Čaks ir lielisks jaunu iesauku izgudrotājs, bet Mazulim labāk patīk vārds, kurā viņu sauc jau sen.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Rabls un viņa celtnieksuņu ģimene pārceļas uz netālu esošo Celtnieklīci, kur viņi dzīvo, spēlējas un būvē visu, kas nepieciešams pilsētai.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pastaigas laikā Barbapapas atrod megalītu. Barbagudrajam uznāk ģēnija cienīga iedvesma un viņš izgudro "Bam".

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Lielais Sarkanais Cālis nejauši sarucina Doru un Zābaciņu, tāpēc Doras brālītim un māsiņai jāpalīdz viņiem atkal kļūt lieliem. Dora glābj draugus no Benija gaisa balona, lai visi varētu doties uz svinībām Karalienes pilī.

programme.title: Mazā Šefpavāriņa šovs
programme.desc: Šefpavāriņu tik ļoti uztrauc avokado gatavība, ka viņš pilnībā aizmirst par pārējo avokado suši receptes daļu. Šefpavāriņa draugs iedvesmo viņu radīt mājās Havaju gaisotni, pagatavojot poju un izdekorējot Celmu.

programme.title: Briežu komanda
programme.desc: Kajam aptrūkušās idejas izgudrotāju sacensību laikā. Skrambas izgudrojums pienācīgi nedarbojas un rada sliktus laika apstākļus. Seram Tēraudam ļoti garšo burbuļtēja, bet viņš salauž Skrambas burbuļtējas automātu. Rezultātā ielas ir pērļu pilnas.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepas ģimene uz dienu aizņemas no vectēva laivu. Tētis ir kapteinis, Pepa, Džordžs un mamma ir apkalpe. Kad laiva iestrēgst niedrēs, tētim jāizmanto viss spēks, lai to atbrīvotu.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un aitiņa Sūzija sastrīdas un nolemj, ka viņas vairs nav labākās draudzenes. Pēc kāda laika viņas sāk ilgoties viena pēc otras, bet atsakās izlīgt.

programme.title: Cūciņa Pepa
programme.desc: Pepa un Džordžs spēlē dārzā bumbu, kad Sūzijas ierodas ar divām tenisa raketēm. Viņa izmanto bumbiņu, lai ar Pepu spēlētu tenisu, liekot Džordžam justies atstumtam. Vai bumbiņas pienesēja darbs viņu uzmundrinās?

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Jauni piedzīvojumi ar DORU! Pievienojies drošajai pasaules pētītājai Dorai un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam viņu kopīgajos ceļojumos pa maģisko lietusmežu, kurā var notikt - un notiek - brīnumu lietas. Lets go!

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbatētis un Barbamamma paziņo bērniem, ka divatā dosies atpūsties uz Lieldienu salu. Barbabērni, dvīņi un Stingrā kungs dodas izbraucienā ar jahtu.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Kurš gan negribētu zināt, par ko sapņo barbabērni, kamēr viņi mierīgi dus? Kurš gan negribētu zināt, par ko sapņo barbabērni, kamēr viņi mierīgi dus?

programme.title: Ķepaiņu lietas
programme.desc: Antropomorfisku dzīvnieku pasaulē Sems Snovs un Kita Keisija ir elitāri KLEID (Slepenā dzīvnieku detektīvu ekspertu līga) aģenti, kas apceļo pasauli un risina noslēpumus, liekot lietā problēmu risināšanas un dzīvnieku faktu pārzināšanas prasmes.

programme.title: Ķepu patruļa
programme.desc: "Ķepu patruļa" ir seriāls pirmsskolas vecuma bērniem, kura galvenie varoņi ir seši varonīgi kucēni Čeiss, Māršals, Rokijs, Zuma, Rabls un Skaja, kuru saimnieks ir tehnoloģijas pārzinošais 10 gadus vecais zēns Raiders. Viņiem ir unikālas problēmu risināšanas spējas, stilīgi braucamrīki un daudz kucēniem raksturīga mīļa humora. "Kepu patruļa" dodas bīstamās glābšanas misijās, lai Piedzīvojumu līča iedzīvotāji būtu drošībā. Māršals – suns ugunsdzējs, Čeiss – suns policists, Skaja, kura lido savā helikopterā, un citi – katram kucēnam ir sava īpaša personība un spējas, atspoguļojot kopīga darba un pilsoniskās atbildības nozīmību. Viņiem visiem uz muguras ir īpašas mugursomas, lai viņi būtu spējīgi paveikt visu, sākot no kaķēnu glābšanas līdz vilciena apturēšanai, neļaujot tam nokrist no klints. Lai cik liels būtu piedzīvojums, "Ķepu patruļai" vienmēr atliek laiks spēlēm, jautrībai un tam, lai Raiders pakasa aiz auss. Interesants "Ķepu patruļas" fakts – Raders izglāba visus kucēnus un iemācīja tiem viņu spējas.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: Dora, Zābaciņš un Karte palīdz tēvocim Tesoro atrast pazaudētos dārgumu pēddziņus un atkal kļūt par dārgumu karti. Dora un Zābaciņš pēta noslēpumainu atslēgu, lai iepazītu Doras vecvecvecmāmiņu - pašu pirmo zinātkāro pētnieci.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Barbalala saņem paciņu ar rozā zvēriņiem, ko nosauc par Skvīkijiem. Barbabravo, Barbalala un Barbabo ir apnicis, ka brāļi un māsas par viņiem smejas.

programme.title: Barbapapa

programme.title: Rabla komanda
programme.desc: Kad vējaina diena traucē būvēt saldējuma veikalu, Rabls, Miksa un Čārdžers ķeras pie darba. Rātsnamā kaut kas mistiski čīkst. Mērs Greitveja lūdz Rablam un Čārdžeram to atrast un salabot pirms viņas runas.

programme.title: Dora
programme.desc: DORA atgriežas ar jauniem fantastiskiem piedzīvojumiem burvju lietusmežā. Pievienojies mazajai drosminiecei un viņas labākajam draugam Zābaciņam jaunu draugu un jaunu prieku meklējumos. Lets go!

programme.title: Mazā Šefpavāriņa šovs
programme.desc: Olija gatavo vienkāršu kūku dinoklubiņam, bet Šefpavāriņš grib sarežģīt recepti. Šefpavāriņš un Olija gatavo pelmeņus, taču, kad iesācējai Olijai tas padodas labāk, Šefpavāriņam jāatgūst pārliecinātība par savām locīšanas prasmēm.

programme.title: Barbapapa
programme.desc: Pasaules krāsainākās ģimenes atgriešanās! Barbapapas - lielā ģimene! Barbapapu dzīvē nav rutīnas. Katra diena ir pārsteigumu un piedzīvojumu pilna!

programme.title: Barbapapa

programme.title: Dora

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Karija kunga un Padingtona mīļākais radio raidījums tiek atcelts - kā viņi zinās, kā tas beidzas? Karija kungs uz dienu kļūst par Padingtona sulaini - bet viņam labāk padodas komandēt, nekā klausīt.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: Notiek Vindzoru dārzu dzīvnieku izstāde, Padingtons ir tiesnesis. Visi ir tik talantīgi, kā viņam izvēlēties? / Padingtons, Džūdija un Džonatans atklāj, ka spēlēties ar kaimiņiem ir jautrāk, nekā censties pārspēt, kaut arī Toks zog idejas!

programme.title: Briežu komanda
programme.desc: Tērauds grib doties uz Mēnesi un liek profesoram Skrambai pārvērst Tērauda torņus par kosmosa raķeti. Burvis nozog publikas uzmanību no Ramija uzstāšanās. Ramijs atriebjas, paņemot viņa cepuri un radot trušu invāziju.

programme.title: Lācēna Padingtona piedzīvojumi
programme.desc: "Padingtona piedzīvojumi" ir jau pazīstamais lācis jaunā versijā. Sirsnīgss seriāls par zinātkāri, labestību pret citiem un dzīvi mīlošā ģimenē. Katra 11 minūšu sērija veidota pēc Maikla Bonda grāmatu motīviem un jauno Padingtona filmu garā. Tās atklās jaunus Padingtona stāstus oriģinālā un aizraujošā animācijā. Seriāls patiks gan bērniem, gan pieaugušajiem. Pieaugušie atpazīs jau iemīļoto Padingtonu, bet bērni viņu iepazīs pirmo reizi. Seriāls jūtami Padingtona spēlfilmu motīvi, taču galvenā atšķirība ir personāži. Īpaši Braunu ģimene, kas ir jauni cilvēki, nevis pusmūža pāris kā filmās.

programme.title: Bleizs un automonstri
programme.desc: Bleizs un automonstri ir interaktīvs seriāls datorgrafikā par Bleizu, lieliskāko automonstru pasaulē, tā vadītāju astoņgadīgu zēnu vārdā Eidžejs un viņu piedzīvojumiem Asupilī. Asupilī nav lielākas zvaigznes par Bleizu. Viņš ir čempions sacīkšu trasē un varonis ārpus tās. Kad vien ir kāda ķibele, visi vēršas pie viņa, jo zina, ka Bleizs spēj to, ko nespēj citas mašīnas. Viņš ir ātrākais automonstrs pilsētā - viņam piemīt bliezienātrums! Liekot lietā savas zināšanas, Bleizs spēj tikt galā ar jebkādu izaicinājumu. Ja situācija kļūst sarežģīta, viņš spēj iztēloties sevi par jebkuru mašīnu, pārvērsties par to un pavisam viegli atrisināt ikvienu problēmu.

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: In this action-packed adventure comedy series we follow children of the Hunter family-Tess, Anika, Sal, Daniel and Max, the newest member of the family as they search for their missing foster parents through all Amsterdam. At the same time they must run from the people that mean them harm and solve the family mystery to uncover the special treasure and get their parents back and in the process they learn a lot about love and family.

programme.title: Tyler Perrys Young Dylan
programme.desc: Hilarious television series, created by Tyler Perry, that follows the life and adventures of a street-smart kid and aspiring hip-hop artist Young Dylan. When Dylans grandmother Viola realizes that raising her grandson is too much to take on, she decides to send him to live indefinitely with her wealthy son Myles Wilson, his wife Yasmine and their two kids Rebecca and Charlie. Everyone will have to adapt to their new normal, and they will get themselves in lots of hilarious situations along the way. Dylan will teach his cousins about swag and street smarts, but he will soon learn that even rappers have rules in the Wilson house.

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: Nori already feels guilty about lying to Silas about the islands mysteries. Then Silas returns from a shipwreck dive and gets trapped inside a mirror - a centuries-old pirate taking control of his body, out for revenge

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: The school is looking for a new mascot, and Chloe and her new friends think they can make an impression by designing the winning entry. Chloe, Jinx, and Booch create a costume they are excited about, leaving it at the beach house until the they can present it at school. Meanwhile, Phoebe learns that Max has gotten them jobs at the school, but while he has a cushy Vice Principal job, she is the new Art teacher. Their argument over this leads to accidentally destroying it the new mascot costume. After Chloe discovers what theyve done and is furious with them, Max and Phoebe realize that being her guardian comes with more responsibility than they imagined.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: The Casagrandes
programme.desc: Family-orientated cartoon for kids. Ronnie Anne Santiago, her big brother Bobby and their mum have recently moved to Great Lakes City and are now getting used to life in this busy, and sometimes chaotic, new town. Here in the big city they meet the Casagrandes – their extended family made up of grandparents, aunt, uncle, cousins and their pets. Along with a bunch of friends they all live as one big happy family. Skateboarding Ronnie Anne also starts to explore what their new hometown has to offer. Meanwhile, Bobby helps his grandfather Hector working in the family store where they meet lots of interesting characters from the neighbourhood.

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob volunteers to babysit Sandys Nutty Nieces, then in Insecurity Guards, SpongeBob and Patrick volunteer as guards at the museum, while Squidward attempts to hang his painting unnoticed. 15:00 Rock, Paper, Scissors Rock, Paper and Scissors are three best friends who share an apartment together and compete over everything. Week to week, they have tiny problems that always get out of hand. (Subtitled) 15:15 Rock, Paper, Scissors Rock, Paper and Scissors are three best friends who share an apartment together and compete over everything. Week to week, they have tiny problems that always get out of hand. (Subtitled)

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants
programme.desc: SpongeBob SquarePants is a cartoon series starring the yellow sea sponge Spongebob who lives deep in the ocean in the underwater town called Bikini Bottom. Together with his buddy the pink starfish Patrick, he experiences the craziest and most exciting adventures. Spongebob has a very energetic and optimistic character and works as a chef in restaurant "The Krusty Krab" where he makes the best burgers of the bottom of the sea.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Having filled up another wish card, Hazel is enjoying a fun, fantasy wish. Meanwhile, Cookie, the fairy who got bested by Hazel, Cosmo, and Wanda after their Wish Trials, is setting a trap for our trio. She tricks them into publicly talking about magic at a fake museum exhibit, records the evidence, and then takes them to Fairy Court. Now, Hazel must prove that Cosmo and Wanda are innocent, or else lose them forever. // Frustrated by her moms split attention between work and home, Hazel wishes to be her assistant to spend more time with her. Cosmo and Wanda turn Hazel into an adult, and she spends the day struggling to fulfill her duties. Even though being a working adult is hard, Hazel is excited to be spending so much quality time with Angela. But when the puppet standing in for Hazel at school gets called into the nurses office, Angela rushes off to take care of it and Hazel must give the presentation instead!

programme.title: Super Duper Bunny League
programme.desc: The bunnies find themselves in a stinky situation when Stumpy refuses to wash his lucky cape. // When a taco truck glow-up attracts some out-of-this-world customers, the bunnies must save the day.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Gargamel tries to teach Dwayne to catch the Smurfs. As an incentive, he offers him a deal: hell get him a new Snap if he catches a Smurf. Suddenly Dwayne is all in! He prepares a potion that will turn him into a super tracker. What he hadnt expected was the potion turning him into a hunting dog. After several unsuccessful but funny attempts, he finds his way to the Smurf village. Oh no! Who can get him off the trail? // Meteorite is tireless: shes always tapping the beat on whatever she has at hand. When shes drumming in the forest, she and Storm run into Gargamel. They manage to escape but she forgets her drum. Gargamel makes the most of this and bewitches it so that it comes to life. Its music hypnotizes the Smurfies and leads them straight to Gargamel. Meteorite uses his own weapon against him in an unexpected way!

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks hinges on David Seville, a single father whose everyday struggle is to bring up his kids, 3 chipmunks: Alvin- the oldest brother, the leader, not so good at school, Simon- the smartest of the three brothers, exemplary pupil and Theodore- the youngest one, the chubby one, the gentle one. David "Dave" sometimes loses his temper and then he is shouting "Alvinnnnn!!!". Music is an obligatory pleasant part of every episode. Every episode touches up-to-date issues of both adults and kids from modern life like real problems at school, dating and so on. Thanks to their own foolishness chipmunks often find themselves in ridiculous situations and have to use their creativity to get out of a mess, that provides us with a good opportunity to enjoy their joyful adventures.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.title: The Fairly OddParents: A New Wish
programme.desc: Hazel wishes to meet a dinosaur. Cosmo and Wanda bring Bary, a Baryonyx from the Cretaceous period, to present day. Hazel makes wishes to find Bary a job but unfortunately, Bary never quite fits in. Worse, his giant dinosaur tail knocks out power to the whole city, ruining Dimmadelphias prized Electric Light Ice Cream Float Parade. With Hazel feeling remorseful, Bary musters inspiration from his hero, the great Thomas Rex-ison, and uses his dinosaur smarts to try to save the day. // Hazel has planned a night of watching scary movies with her new friend, Jasmine, but it turns out Jasmine hates scary movies. Rather than change the plan, Hazel wishes Jasmine had no fears. When Cosmo and Wanda grant the wish, the fears escape Jasmines mind, coming into the real world. Hazel tries fighting the fears off but learns its Jasmine who must face them to make them disappear. Now, shes got to talk her new friend into doing everything shes most afraid of, which gets the attention of Fear Itself!

programme.title: The Patrick Star Show
programme.desc: Welcome to the Patrick Star Show hosted by Patrick himself and revolving around his extraordinary family and his own bizzare fantasies. Get to know his family, his Dad Cecil Star, his Mom Bunny Star, his sister Squidina Star, and GrandPat Star, and find out where his charm and eccentricity come from.

programme.title: Tales of the Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Leo, Raph, Donnie and Mikey emerge from the sewers to face challenges alongside April ONeil like never before. When trouble oozes into the streets of New York City, the team finds themselves up against Mechazoids, street gangs, and even the storm of the century! No matter the obstacle, these heroes in a half shell are ready for action with heart and a whole lot of humor.

programme.title: Monster High
programme.desc: Afraid to be embarrassed at a dance-off, Draculaura secretly gives her dance partner, Clawd, enchanted shoes. // Cleo wants the lead role for the school play and raids her familys ancient tomb for a perfect, superior costume.

programme.title: Hunter Street
programme.desc: In this action-packed adventure comedy series we follow children of the Hunter family-Tess, Anika, Sal, Daniel and Max, the newest member of the family as they search for their missing foster parents through all Amsterdam. At the same time they must run from the people that mean them harm and solve the family mystery to uncover the special treasure and get their parents back and in the process they learn a lot about love and family.

programme.title: Tyler Perrys Young Dylan
programme.desc: Hilarious television series, created by Tyler Perry, that follows the life and adventures of a street-smart kid and aspiring hip-hop artist Young Dylan. When Dylans grandmother Viola realizes that raising her grandson is too much to take on, she decides to send him to live indefinitely with her wealthy son Myles Wilson, his wife Yasmine and their two kids Rebecca and Charlie. Everyone will have to adapt to their new normal, and they will get themselves in lots of hilarious situations along the way. Dylan will teach his cousins about swag and street smarts, but he will soon learn that even rappers have rules in the Wilson house.

programme.title: Rock Island Mysteries
programme.desc: At the mine, workers see a ghostly hand coming out of the rock like someone is trying to break through. As more encounters occur, the gang investigate, piecing together sightings from around the island to find a pattern.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: Phoebe and Max unwittingly let Chloes friends watch a horror movie and eat candy, leaving them traumatized and craving more sugar. Jinx and Boochs parents want to meet with Chloes parents to discuss the lack of supervision at the beach house. With Hank and Barb away, Max and Phoebe are determined to prove they can be good guardians, and use a disguise gadget to transform into their parents to help Chloe. It goes well until the real Hank and Barb show up, and must transform into Max and Phoebe to keep the ruse going.

programme.title: The Smurfs
programme.desc: Peyos beloved characters are careening back on TV in a brand new, high-voltage, 3D version of this perennial favorite. Using pure Smurf DNA from the comic books, this new series aimed at girls and boys will push the charm and absurdity of the original to greater heights, fitting in perfectly with todays faster-paced times. Were going to present original stories with more complex characters, snappier dialogues, joyful anarchy, and irresistible global appeal for a contemporary audience aged 5 to 10. It will be an explosive box of adventure and humor!

programme.title: Alvinnn!!! and the Chipmunks
programme.desc: ALVINNN!!! and the Chipmunks hinges on David Seville, a single father whose everyday struggle is to bring up his kids, 3 chipmunks: Alvin- the oldest brother, the leader, not so good at school, Simon- the smartest of the three brothers, exemplary pupil and Theodore- the youngest one, the chubby one, the gentle one. David "Dave" sometimes loses his temper and then he is shouting "Alvinnnnn!!!". Music is an obligatory pleasant part of every episode. Every episode touches up-to-date issues of both adults and kids from modern life like real problems at school, dating and so on. Thanks to their own foolishness chipmunks often find themselves in ridiculous situations and have to use their creativity to get out of a mess, that provides us with a good opportunity to enjoy their joyful adventures.

programme.title: The Thundermans: Undercover
programme.desc: New adventures for The Thundermans unfold after Phoebe and Max are sent undercover to handle a new threat in the seaside town of Secret Shores, and bring Chloe along to develop her superhero talent. While they investigate suspicious activity coming from the local school, Chloe forms a bond with two classmates, who dont realize their new friend has secret powers. As the danger increases, the Thunderman trio must stay in town indefinitely, leaving the squabbling twins in charge of raising their younger sister.

programme.title: Henry Danger
programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.

programme.title: Danger Force
programme.desc: This fun spin-off of Henry Danger is set in the Swellview Academy for the Gifted and follows the adventures of four young friends. Chapa, Miles, Bose and Mika were ordinary kids, until they discovered they have superpowers. They are recruited by Captain Man to become his new crime-fighting crew, and protect the city of Swellview from various villains. But before that Captain Man must teach them how to control their superpowers, as well as to how to work as a team, using Schwoz as his helper.

programme.desc: Henry Danger is a story about adventures of a 13-year-old Henry Hart who is lucky to become a helpmate of a super hero Captain Man. This is a real dream job of every teen. The newbie is getting paid for fighting against crime and helping to save the world. Brave Henry must hide his job from his family and friends and it is not that simple, but nothing can stop him from being a true crime-fighter. Henry himself wants to become a super hero one day, that is why he is constantly learning from Captain Man and is not scared of any hardships on the way to his dream.
